rnams zlog pa yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang byang chub kyi sems ni bsten cing bsnyen te bsgoms la mang du byas na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob bo/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob na/ des nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs

rgyas rnams rab tu phye'o/ /gang dag 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed de/ 'di lta ste/ rang byang chub la sems shing sgom na/ de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams khyed ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ bskal pa 'di snyed cig na lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi nang du

mtshams sbyar te 'khod nas rang sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro zhes lung ston gyi/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/ /zhes lung mi ston

to/ /nyan thos rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la lung mi ston to/ /gal te nyan thos lung ston na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa las thos nas lung ston to/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod kyang / des ni thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid yongs su bzung ba ma yin gyi/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyi 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ 'di ltar des ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos las ni

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub byung ba ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub byung ba'i phyir ro/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas

bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu

byang chub sems dpa' gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i sems las byang chub kyi sems khyad par du 'phags par bshad pa 'di'i don

ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lung bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par gzung bar 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang

bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa'i

sems 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ dgra bcom pa'i sems 'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gal te dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pas sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la byams pa dang / snying rjes khyab par byas kyang / de'i tshe sems can de dag bde bas tshim par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

de ltar dgra bcom pa ni thabs la mkhas pa ma mchis na/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams la byams pas ji ltar khyab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ji srid du mnyam par gzhag pa de srid kyi bar der byams pa des kha cig ni bde bar 'gyur/ kha cig ni sdug

bsngal bar 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob pa de'i tshe sems kyi skad cig la/ byams pa la gnas shing byams pa mngon par sgrub pa ma lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das gnas ma mchis pa nan gyis

dper bgyis te bshad par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir bdag dang 'dra ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa sha stag gis gang bar gyur la/ de dag kyang byams pa la snyoms par zhugs sam/ gal te snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal na

yang snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'os ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang zag pa med pa'i sems las byang chub sems dpa'i sems mchog ces bya ba nas/ gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan

yang gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa sha stag tu gyur la/ dgra bcom pa re res kyang bdud kyi sde 'khrugs med 'khrugs med snyed mngon par sprul na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'khrugs med de dag mang ba yin nam/

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa de dag dang / dpung de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems

dpa'i byang chub kyi sems de bzlog par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems de gnyis kyi nang na gang mthu che/ sems can thams cad zag pa zad par

gyur pa rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i sems gang yin pa mthu che'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems mthu che/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sems ches mthu che lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i

byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems ches mthu che ba yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu zag pa med pa'i sems kyis bdud kyi sde 'khrugs med dpag tu med pa rdzu 'phrul gyis mngon par sprul na yang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyis/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/

gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems yongs su gtugs par mi nus so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems 'di dag gi nang na sems gang mchog ces bya ba nas/ gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du gang yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub

sems dpa'i sems mchog ces bgyi ba nas/ gong na ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar zag pa ma mchis pa'i sems kyis gtugs par bgyir rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang khyod nyid la yongs su dri bar byas/ khyod

kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gal te mching bu'i nor bu dag gi nang du/ nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya bzhag na/ ci mching bu'i nor bu de dag gis nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya la gsal ba dang / rin thang gis thub bam/ gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /mching bu'i nor bu dag gi phung po chen pos nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya gcig kyang zil gyis gnon par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ci'i phyir/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mching bu'i nor bu de dag ni yongs

su dag pa yang ma lags/ kha dog bzang ba yang ma lags/ rin thang yang chung la/ brjod par yang nus pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mching bu'i nor bu ni gnas rgya chen po nas byung ba yang ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya ni rigs kyis 'phags pa

lags te/ sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas byung ba lags te/ de ni mching bu'i nor bu mang pos zil gyis gnon par rngo mi thogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni nyan thos thams cad kyi sems zil gyis gnon par 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang 'di yang dag par gzigs nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mchog nyid du bzhag pa nas/

gong na med pa nyid kyi bar du bzhag pa yin no/ /nyan thos dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems gang byams pa dang ldan pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa yang zad par byed mi nus so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan

pa de dag gis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'phang bar nus mod kyi/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par byed mi nus so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan

pa de dag gis kyang / rgya mtsho chen po kha'i dbugs kyis skam par nus mod kyi/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni zil gyis mnan pa'am/ zad par byed mi nus so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ mngon par shes pa

drug dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sreg pa'i me'i phung po chen po de yang kha'i dbugs kyis gsad par nus mod kyi/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni zil gyis mnan pa'am/ zad

par byed mi nus so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mchog ces bya/ gtso bo dang / phul dang / ra ba dang / rab mchog dang / bla na med pa nas gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod do/ /de

skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rgya che zhing zad par bgyi ba'am/ bzlog par mi nus pa ngo

mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyis su mi gsung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gnyis su med par gsung zhing / de bzhin

kho na ste gzhan du ma yin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can gzhan dag byung bar gyur la/ sa'i khams ji snyed pa dang / chu'i khams ji snyed pa dang / me'i khams ji snyed pa dang / rlung gi khams

ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can gzhan dag byung bar gyur na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha

ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag kyang mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan par gyur te/ re re zhing 'di ltar maud gal gyi bu chen po lta bur rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par gyur la/ rdzu 'phrul can de dag gis 'di ltar sems can de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bdud sdig can mngon par sprul te/ sdig can

re re la yang sems can de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi glang po che'i tshogs yod pa dang / rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs yod par gyur te/ bgrang ba 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis/ dgra bcom pa rdzu 'phrul can de dag re re sprul pa byed pa'i sprul pa de dag re

res kyang de bzhin du sprul pa mngon par sprul na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de dag bgrang ba la 'jug par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i rigs

kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gang na gnas pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsreg par mngon par sprul pa byed na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par ston pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das de dag ni rdzu 'phrul che ba lags so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan zhing / 'jigs pa chen po'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa gang gA'i

klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par gnas la/ de ltar 'jigs pa drag po kun nas ston kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sems zad par bya ba'am/ zil gyis mnan pa'am/ bzlog nus pa'i skal ba med do/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam

du sems/ sems can dpag tu med pa de dag dang / bdud sdig can de dag gi rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa 'di gnyis la/ gang ches mthu dang ldan pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul dang ldan

pa 'di dag gi nang na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems 'di ni ches mthu dang ldan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs dang

ldan pa gang yin pa de mchog byed pa'am/ mchog tu 'byung bar 'os pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ rnam grangs 'dis na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma gtogs par byang chub sems

dpa'i sems mchog ces bgyi ba nas gong na ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par bgyir rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad

ces bka' stsal to/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par byar mi nus so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu

gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs gang gis na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zad par byar mi nus/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi phyir byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa na de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs nas sbyin par byed de/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zad par bya ba'am/ zil gyis mnan par mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/

skyes bu tshong pa zhig zong 'bum phrag mang po spyod cing / de tshong byed la/ tshong pa des tshong dpon nam/ ded dpon gang yang rung ba las lo 'bum phrag mang po zhig nas skyin po blangs pa las/ de'i tshong ma rung bar gyur nas/ des rgyal po la bskor te rgyal po'i gan du song ngo / /

de rgyal po'i dpung des na rgyal pos yongs su bzung ba'i mi de la tshong dpon de dang / ded dpon des tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i phyogs dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs de la rten pa'i phyir ro/ /

tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs la rten to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs

dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs de la rten pas na/ de nyan thos thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan par mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ skyes bu rgyal po la rten pa ni longs spyod zad par gyur kyang / 'on kyang tshugs par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs la rten pa yang / 'di ltar nyan thos thams cad dang / bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos thams cad kyis tshugs par 'gyur/ smras pa/

tshe dang ldan pa gang po gal te nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis sgrogs shing 'chad pa na/ de'i sems skyed cing bdag kyang de ltar gyur cig ces sems skyed na/ nyan thos rnams kyis tshugs pa yin no/ /gang de'i gtam gyi ro myong bar byed pa dang / de la yang dga'

bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa bskyed pa des na tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ de dag la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya/ smras pa/ 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gegs byed pa yin te/ 'di dag skyed par byed pa ma yin la/ 'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring bar byed pa yin te/ de bas na 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa

gang po dper na/ rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bya bar 'dod cing / yang dag pa la nges par 'jug par 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug kun tu 'byung ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid ring bar byed pa yin te/ de dag de'i tshul bzhin

ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/ rang sangs

rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnams gegs byed pa yin te/ yid la byed pa de dag skyed na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos rnams kyis zil gyis non pa yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos

rnams kyis zil gyis non pa yin te/ gang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa skyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid la byed pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi chud pa'i phyir ro/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ rgyun du zhugs pa nyon mongs pa kun tu spyod na sbyin gnas su mi 'gyur te/ gal te gang gis de'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i shes pa thob na/ des de rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya bar rab tu phye ba yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis

rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de ltar na shes pa yongs su shes pa dang / spong ba la 'dris pas de rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems kun tu spyod cing skye bas/ byang

chub sems dpa' zhes rab tu phye ba ma yin gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag skye bas/ 'di lta ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar rab tu phye ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems

la gnas na tshugs par mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa dper na/ 'phong gi slob dpon ni gnas na 'dug kyang rung / 'gro yang rung / dgra rnams kyis tshugs par dka' ba yin te/ gzhan gyi mda' yang gcod cing bdag kyang srung ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang

chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yang tshugs par dka'o/ /nyan thos kyi spyod pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thos na yang 'di ltar bdag kyang myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa da ltar nyan thos rnams la chos ston pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang nyan thos rnams la chos ston par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa de ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub

sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa la tshugs par mi nus te/ nyan thos kyi gtam mam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam thos na yang / chos kyi gtam 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ngo zhes de bzhin gshegs pa dran par byed de/ nyan thos rnams la chags pa mi

skyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa ni thub par dka' ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa dper na/ rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa dmigs pa thob cing / ting nge 'dzin legs par bsgoms pa'i phyir rnam par rtog

pa rnams kyis mi tshugs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dmigs pa de la rab tu goms pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yang thub par dka'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i

phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gal te byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' bar rig par bya na/ theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa gang dag yin pa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa gang dag yin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa gang dag yin pa thams cad

dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang thub par dka' ba yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dam bcas pa las bskyod mi nus te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub kyi

sems la gnas pa de dag ni thams cad kyang thub par dka' ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' da ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lo bye ba brgya phrag mang po nas mngon par

rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bzhugs shing gzhes pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin

pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tha ma'i sems thob pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa rnams kyis mnyam mo/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di dag ji ltar khyad par med/ smras

pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi sems la ni khyad par med de/ 'on kyang mgyogs bul gyis ni khyad par yod do/ /sems de gnyi ga ni mnyam ste/ gang zhe na/ byang chub tu mngon par sgrub pa gang dag yin pa rnams so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub

sems dpa'i sems la gnas pa ni phyir mi ldog go/ /dgra bcom pa gang dgra bcom pa nyid las ldog la/ zag pa med pa'i sems las kyang ldog na/ de dgra bcom pa nyid du rig par bya'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin te/ de ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal

can yin par rig par bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sems las phyir ldog pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub tu khas 'che bar zad de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin gyi/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'

sun 'byin pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar rig par bya ba ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi zhig pho mtshan dang ldan par gyur te/ dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa las/

phyis de'i pho mtshan med par gyur la/ pho mtshan gyi bya ba byed mi nus na/ de ni ma ning zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems rmug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las

byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas yid la byed pa ji lta bu bskyed par bya'i/ smras pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa bskyed par bya'o/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la gnas pa yin no/ /de ltar gnas

pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /gal te de ltar yongs su sngo bar mi byed na/ de ni sbyin pa yin gyi/

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyin pa sbyin pa na rnam par rtog ste/ bdag gis cung zad ni yongs su btang la cung zad ni yongs su ma btang ngo zhes rnam par rtog par byed cing 'di ni bdag gis sbyin par bya/ 'di ni

sbyin par mi bya'o/ /'di la ni sbyin/ 'di la ni mi sbyin no zhes rnam par rtog par byed de/ ngan pa ni sbyin par bya/ bzang po ni sbyin par mi bya/ tshul khrims can la ni sbyin par bya/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la ni sbyin par mi bya'o zhes rnam par rtog par byed na/ rnam par rtog pa 'di

dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bar chad byed pa yin no/ /de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni yun ring mo zhig gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /bdag yun ring mo zhig gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur grang zhes rnam par rtog

par mi bya'o/ /thams cad la mnyam par gtong zhing sems mnyam pa ni myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas

de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /sbyin pa zil gyis mnan te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la zan byin la/ zan zos pa'i 'og tu

sems can de dag la gser gyi dong tse dang / ras bcos bu zung dang / gser thags can gyi ras byin la/ de bzhin du nyi ma gung dang / phye ma red dang / de bzhin du mtshan mo nam gyi cha stod dang / de bzhin du nam gyi gung dang / de bzhin du nam gyi cha smad kyi thun la/ sems can

gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la zan byin la/ de bzhin du sbyin pa yang byin te/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas shing / de bzhin du yongs su gtong yang ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya ba mi shes na/ de ni sbyin pa yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

ma yin no/ /ji ste yongs su bsngo ba shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa'i thad na mang du yongs su gtong ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de chos tshad med pa'i chos thob par 'dod cing / byang chub

sems dpa'i chos kyang thob par 'dod na/ tshad dang ldan pa'i yongs su gtong bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /gal te sbyin pa de tshad nges par gyur na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang gi phyir sbyin pa de tshad nges pa ma yin pa de'i phyir/ sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshad nges pa ma yin pa'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas phyis kyang yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su gtang bar bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni thabs

des na/ ser sna tshar gcod cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to/ /de yang 'di ltar bdag gis sbyin pa dpag tu med pa sbyin par bya ste/ gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du sbyin par bya'o/ /

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams la phan gdags par bya'o/ /da ltar ni ji srid du byang chub tu spyod pa'i bar du zang zing gis phan gdags par bya'o/ /bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na ni/ zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas/ sems can rnams la phan gdags par bya'o snyam du sems skyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi zhig rgyal po la sten te/ de rgyal po la sten cing 'khor la bsnyen bkur

byas pas/ rgyal po des de la zan sbyin zhing / des zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs te/ des bsten cing bskor te/ bsnyen bkur byas pas rgyal po mnyes shing dgyes par gyur nas/ rin po che brgya stong du ma bskon pa de bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' bla na

med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang / byang chub tu spyod pa na/ sems can dpag tu med pa la zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /

zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas/ sems can rnams la 'doms shing rjes su ston te/ sems can dpag tu med pa dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las grol bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ rgyal po'i bu zhig yod la/ mi mang po gang dag gis rgyal po'i bu

de la sten cing bskor te/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ rgyal po'i bu des bsten pa'i mi de dag thams cad la kha zas g.yos pas phan 'dogs par byed de/ ji tsam na rgyal po'i bu de rgyal srid la gnas pa'i dus la bab ste/ rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur zhing / rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob

pa'i tshe/ de'i mi zhabs 'bring rnying du gyur pa gang yin pa de dag la/ 'di dag ni bdag gzhon nu'i sa la gnas pa na/ bdag gis sbyangs shing bdag gir byas pa yin/ bdag kyang 'di dag gis sbyangs shing bdag gir byas pa yin gyis/ bdag gis mi 'di dag longs

spyod la ci rigs par dgod do snyam ste/ des bdag gis 'khor rnams kha cig ni grong khyer dag tu sna bor bcug /kha cig ni las kyi sna dag tu/ kha cig ni tshong 'dus dag tu/ kha cig ni 'or gyi grong dag tu bskos/ kha cig la ni grong dam pa longs spyod du byin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa

gang po de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang / byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na sems can dpag tu med pa dag la phan 'dogs te/ zang zing gi sbyin pa gos dang / zas

dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zong dag gis phan 'dogs te/ ji ltar rgyal po gzhon nu des 'khor de dag kha zas g.yos pa dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba ci 'byor pa dag gis phan 'dogs pa de bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems

dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas kyang / sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing / gang gi tshe de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/ bdud rtsi'i dbang bskur ba thob pa na/ blo ji lta

ba dang / shes rab ji lta ba bzhin du zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas 'doms shing rjes su ston to/ /zang zing med pa'i chos kyis 'doms shing rjes su ston pa na/ kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god/ kha cig ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu la/ kha cig ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la/ kha cig ni bzod pa'i sa la 'god/ kha cig ni mthong ba'i sa la/ kha cig ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji ltar rgyal po'i bu de gang gi tshe/ rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/

sten pa'i mi de dag ci rigs par longs spyod la 'god pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams ji ltar mos pa bzhin du 'god par byed de de ltar byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god par byed do/ /de

ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur la/

yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi zhig rgyal po la sten te/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ de'i tshe rgyal po des zas dang gos kyi bgo skal byin nas/ gang gi tshe mi des rgyal po de la shas cher bsten pa

de'i tshe/ rgyal po de mnyes shing dgyes par gyur te/ de thugs rangs par gyur nas/ gos dang rgyan brgya stong du ma bskon te/ longs spyod kyis rgyas par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed cing / de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / zang zing med pa'i

chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams la 'doms shing rjes su ston te/ 'khor ba las sgrol bar byed do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus ji ltar bshad pa de

de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa dper na/ mi gang dag gser gyi 'byung khung de'i nyen kor na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni/ gser gyi 'byung khung des nams kyang nye bar mi 'tsho bar mi 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe gsar du brkos shing phyung nas ring por ma lon pa de'i

tshe yang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe shin tu dri ma med par byas shing shin tu sbyangs nas snying por byas te phyung ba de'i tshe yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/ /gang gi tshe 'byung khung de nas bton nas bzhus te/ de nas sum cha'am/

bzhi cha gser du gyur pa de'i tshe yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / nams kyang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na

yang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'dod pa na yang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba

yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rgyu 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med do/ /rgyu des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mchog ces bya/ gtso bo dang / phul dang / rab dang /

rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa dang / theg pa

chen po la zhugs pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bus ji skad bshad pa bzhin du zung shig /chongs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis

de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u dgu pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs so// //bam po gsum pa/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal

byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu

rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad la dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son

pa sha stag dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ gzhan yang gzi brjid che ba'i/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi

'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid las brtsams nas 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/ khyod spobs par gyis shig /

de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das las skabs phye ba thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang

pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan par rig par bya/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'chal par rig par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul ni

gang yin/ spyod yul ma yin pa ni gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la gal te byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i

yid la byed pa rnams kyi gnas na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'o/ /de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par rig par bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa'o/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa'

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dam bcas pa spong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i dam bcas pa spong na/ tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang

ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo na/ spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod do/ /spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod na/ de tsam gyis na tshul khrims 'chal par rig par bya'o/ /gal

te byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas shing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod pa tsam gyis ni/ de tshul khrims 'chal par rig par bya ba ma yin gyi/ gang sbyin pa sbyin zhing nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo na/ de tsam gyis na tshul khrims

'chal pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ rgyal po'i bu rgyal pos gdams pa'i tshig bzhin du byed pa zhig yod la/ rgyal rigs rnams kyi rgyal po'i bus bslab par bya ba bzo'i gnas/ 'di ltar glang po che'i gnya' bar bzhon pa'am/ rta

bzhon pa'am/ shing rta bzhon pa'am/ ral gri'i thabs sam/ 'phong ngam/ mda' bo che 'phang ba'i thabs sam/ brgyug pa'am/ 'gom pa'am/ 'chong ba'am/ stobs 'gyed pa'am/ dgra thabs sam/ de la sogs pa'i bzo de dag la slob na/ rgyal

po la dben pa yin te/ rgyal po yang sma dbab par mi sems so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rtse zhing dga' la/ dga' dgur spyod du zin kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de ni thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid la phan 'dogs pa nyid du gyur pa yin no/ /gal te yang sbyin pa sbyin pa na nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo na/ de tsam gyis na spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa yin te/ bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zhing du mi rung bar byed do/ /ji lta ji ltar

bdag nyid zhing du mi rung bar byed pa de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to/ /ji lta ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa de lta de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod

pa yin no/ /de'i spyod yul ma yin pa gang yin pa de nyid ni/ de'i tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gal te khyim gyi gnas nas byung bar gyur te/ de yang tshul khrims gang dang gang yang dag par bzung nas gnas pa de yang thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su mi sngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas shing /

gsum la skyabs su song bar gyur la/ de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/ de 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan rnams la longs spyod du zin kyang / de tsam gyis na de byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /byang chub

sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin no/ /gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa dang

ldan pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa rnams 'byung du zin kyang / de dag thams cad de'i thams cad mkhyen pa yid la byed pa'i sems gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya ni/ mching bu'i nor bu 'bum dag dang

lhan cig tu bsres te bzhag na/ nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i rin thang med pa dang / kha dog bzang po dang 'od kyis mching bu'i nor bu de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang /

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems gcig bskyed pas zil gyis gnon par rig par bya ste/ ji ltar mching bu'i nor bu de dag nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya gcig gis zil gyis non cing lam mer ma gyur pa bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal

te byang chub sems dpa' mtshan rnams 'dod cing sbyin pa sbyin na/ spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa'o/ /gang de'i spyod yul ma yin pa thams cad ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpas mtshan rnams 'dod pas sbyin pa sbyin par

mi bya'i/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod pas sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod pa de la ni mtshan rnams yod do/ /de la ni mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /de la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad rnams yod pa nas sangs

rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yod de/ de ltar na de'i sbyin pa ni mchog tu bzung ba ma yin no/ /gang gi tshe mchog tu ma bzung ba de'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid 'dod pas sbyin pa sbyin par byed na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mchog tu 'dzin pa ma yin nam/ gang dang gang la mchog tu 'dzin pa de nyid de'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni yul

na gnas pa'am/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin no/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ gzugs sam/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa yang ma yin no/ /'du byas kyang ma yin/ 'du ma byas pa yang ma yin/ tshad yod pa yang ma yin te/

de ni mchog tu bzung bar mi nus so/ /chos gang yang dmigs su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa de ni yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin te/ gang yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin pa ni mchog tu gzung bar mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de lta bas na/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin nam/ tshul khrims srung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/ tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ma yin no/ /gal te yang tshul khrims de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar

yongs su sngo na/ tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims las nyams pa yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar nyams pa phyir bslang bar nus sam/ smras pa/ gal te yang

dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du ma byas la gal te bden pa rnams ma mthong na phyir yang bslang bar nus so/ /yang smras pa/ 'di la tshe dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ yang dag

pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o/ /smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ smras pa/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i skal ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /

gal te de chos nub par gyur pa'i tshe byung na ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po rgyu 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par ma gyur gyi bar du yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byar ma gnang ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa

gang po gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ tshul khrims de sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir mngon par mi sgrub na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po

gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can tshad yod pa rnams kyi ched du sbyin pa sbyin nam/ tshul khrims srung na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/

byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims gang yin smras pa/ sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba de thams cad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims so/ /gal

te yang byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ tshul khrims bsgom pa'i phyir spyod la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su mi sngo na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/ /gal te nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid

du yang yongs su mi sngo na/ de ltar na yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin te/ des tshul khrims 'chal par yang mi brtsi'o/ /gal te nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo na/ de tsam gyis na de tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya'o/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gang yin smras pa/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnams

te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul lo/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du khyim na gnas te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la sten cing longs spyod la/ nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang

sems mi skyed na/ de tsam gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes mi brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar 'dis 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ma dkrugs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi la la zhig nyes pa

med par btson rar bcug ste/ de btson ra der lo mang po lo brgya phrag mang po/ lo 'bum phrag mang por btson rar bcug la/ de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yang 'khrugs par ma gyur/ des rkun po'i sems kyang ma bskyed du zin kyang / de btson rar bcug na/ de tsam gyis ni de rkun

po zhes brjod pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de yang khyim na gnas shing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la yongs su longs spyod pa des/ tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya bar mi brjod do/ /gal te bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du tshangs par

spyad pa spyod la/ de yang nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang 'khrugs na de tsam gyis na de tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes mi bya'o/ /gang gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan thos kyi tshul khrims la gnas

na de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las le'u dang po'o// //tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bskal

pa mtha' yas par mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor bar byas la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras

so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes tshad nges par byed par gyur na/ 'di la nyes pa ci yod/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khor bas skrag cing / de rings pas

dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par yang tshad yod pa nyid du gyur te/ de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/ tshad yod pas ni sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi don bya bar mi nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa ni tshad med grangs med pas na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa ma gtogs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba med do/ /gal te bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang da dung sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi

'gyur te/ mtha' yas pa'i phyir na/ de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor

zhing / 'khor ba de lta de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa legs par yongs su bsgoms par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ snod sar pa sman gyi khu ba'i chus bkang ste bzhag na/ ji lta ji ltar bzhag pa de lta de ltar shin tu bsgos pa dang / shin tu sra bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang

ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor zhing / 'khor ba de lta de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa legs par bsgoms shing ches brtan par 'gyur ba dang / ljid bzod par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na

bum pa sar pa'i nang du mar ram til mar bzhag na/ de ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring du bzhag pa de lta de ltar bum pa de snum dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bum pa de snum gyis khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang

ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor zhing / 'khor ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa thob pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thos

so/ /ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa sgom mo/ /ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de lta de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gang dang gang skyed pa de

thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa skyed de/ sems gzhan dag skye ba'i go skabs mi 'byed do/ /gang gi tshe sems gzhan skye ba'i go skabs mi rnyed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyis sems kyi rgyud yongs su

bsgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na mar gyi bum pa ni gang dang gang nas bzung yang / de dang de mar gyi dri dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems gang dang gang skye ba de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

ldan pa nyid skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la ni bdud sdig can gyis glags btsal kyang glags mi rnyed de/ de ni dmigs pa gang las glags 'tshol ba'i dmigs pa de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgom par byed pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin du bdud kyi

ris rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar sangs

rgyas rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa 'thob pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams thos par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams thos pa de lta de ltar de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing sgom mo/ /ji lta ji ltar nan tan byed cing sgom pa de lta de ltar thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa na/ thog ma kho nar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams 'byung ba'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur la/ de nas de'i 'og tu pha rol

tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ /de ltar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa gang yin pa de/ byang chub sems dpas zil

gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'doms la/ btams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang

zag gang de la 'doms pa de/ byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi la la gser gyi mi khyer te 'gro na khyer ba gang yin pa de nyid gser gyi

mis kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / 'od kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du gal te nyan thos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms na/ nyan thos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non

par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi zhig gis shel gyi mi pang par thogs te 'gro na/ khyer ba gang yin pa de nyid shel gyi mis/ kha dog dang / dbyibs dang /

'od kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gang dag yin pa de dag gi bye ma snyed kyi nyan thos yod par gyur la/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes

su ston na/ de dag thams cad des tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar de dag 'doms pa de lta de ltar nyan thos rnams zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /gal te bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug

ste/ nyan thos de dag byang chub sems dpa' la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'bogs la/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/ nyan thos rnams ni zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang

ldan pa gang po dper na/ gser ni ji lta ji ltar bzhu zhing bskol ba de lta de ltar ches 'od gsal zhing / ches kha dog bzang por 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ji lta ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms

shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/

nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya ni ji lta ji ltar nor bu'i byi dor mkhan 'chang ba de lta de ltar ches 'od gsal ba dang / shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag

gis/ ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas

'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir nyan thos rnams zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ ri mo mkhan nam/ ri mo mkhan gyi slob ma shin tu lobs pas kha dog sna lnga'i tshon gyis ji lta

ji ltar kha dog dang / dbyibs su gzugs 'dri zhing tshon bkye ste/ rdzogs par byed cing sha tshon byed pa de lta de ltar yid du 'ong zhing chags par byed par 'gyur te/ gang gis gzugs rnams bris pa de nyid kha dog dang / dbyibs kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de

bzhin du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas ni nyan thos

rnams zil gyis gnon cing snang bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/ de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyin gcig bzhin du rnam par 'phel lo/ /

de dag ni tshul khrims de tsam nyi tshe dang ldan pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi zhig gis shing bskyed la shing bskyed nas dus dus su byi dor byed cing chus bran na ji lta ji ltar byi dor byed cing chus bran pa de lta de ltar chu zheng dang 'phang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de

bzhin du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel lo/ /ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas nyan thos thams cad

zil gyis gnon cing snang bar byas nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas gang dag de la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang

po dper na/ mi la la me chung ngu'i nang du rtswa dang / shing dang / lci ba rnams 'jug na/ de ji lta ji ltar 'jug pa de lta de ltar de'i rgyu las me de mched par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ji ltar me de mched pa de lta de ltar me'i phung po de shin tu che bar 'gyur te/ des dpag tshad mang po/ dpag tshad

brgya phrag mang po dang / dpag tshad stong phrag mang po rnams sreg cing snang bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med

pas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/ /ji lta

ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snang ba dpag tu med pa de lta de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'doms pa'i nyan thos gzhan gang yin pa dag gis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir

ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi zhig gis gser gyi 'byung khung nas gser blangs te/ des gser de blangs nas bdag nyid kyang btsongs la/ gser de yang btsongs na/ des gser de btsongs pa'i rin ni ches che ba yin gyi/ gang gis gser blangs pa'i mi de'i ni

ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu med cing ches rin thang med

par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la nyan thos de dag gis tshul khrims kyis kyang zil gyis non par mi 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpas ni nyan thos de dag tshul khrims kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag 'doms shing rjes su ston pa gang yin pa de nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zil gyis gnon pa ni byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos bshad pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang

nas tshe dang ldan pa de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes smras so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las le'u gnyis pa'o// //tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus gzhan yang tshe dang ldan

pa byams ma'i bu gang po la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ gal te byed pa po'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ de byang chub sems dpa'i chos la gnas par rig

par bya ba ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos spong zhing tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas spyod do/ /de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'

gang byed pa po'i chos 'ga' yang / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par blangs nas 'dug na/ chos gang la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phan 'dogs pa'am/ gnod par 'gyur/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos gang la yang phan 'dogs pa'am/ gnod par byed pa ma yin no/ /gal te chos 'ga' zhig la phan 'dogs pa'am/ gnod pa byed par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa

yin par rig par bya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos 'ga' la phan 'dogs pa'am/ gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su

'dzin pa ma yin no/ /byed pa po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/ tshul khrims de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang

po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa gang dang gang yongs su btang nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims gang

dang gang srung ba de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' pha rol gyis spyos sam/ brgyad bkag kyang rung ste/ bzod par byed

cing / bzod pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi ched du rtsol bar byed la/

brtson 'grus de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gang dang gang skyed pa de bzhin du/ bsam gtan 'di dag bskyed nas/ rdzu 'phrul

mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ /rdzu 'phrul des kyang sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug cing shes par bya'o/ /de nas snod du gyur par bya'o snyam ste/ sems kyi khyad par de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/ byang chub

sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab gang dang gang la spyod cing / phung po la mkhas pa'am/ khams la mkhas pa'am/ skye mched la mkhas pa'am/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung

ba la mkhas pa'am/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa'am/ mnyam pa nyid du 'du shes nas 'du shes thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam ste/ sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/ byang chub sems

dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /bla na med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni nyan thos gang gis kyang tshul khrims

kyis zil gyis gnon nus pa gang yang med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed

pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni/ theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang

chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas par gyur/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms

la gnas par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de yang theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang

gal te sems can thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang

nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims

kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad smon pa med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang

chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad brgyad par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po

zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gal te tshe dang ldan pa sha ra

dwa ti'i bus bdag gi dri ba dris pa lan gdab pa'i skabs phye na/ tshe dang ldan pa la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig 'dri'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po dris shig dang thos pa'i don brda sprad par bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji gzugs brgyad pa yin par 'dod

dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa brgyad pa yin par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ de las gzhan pa'i chos rnams

la brgyad par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na brgyad pa de gang yin par 'dod/ bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bshad pa'i don de ji lta bur shes par bya/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos

'di rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad kyis mi shes pa de la shes pa gang gis mnyam pa nyid de mngon sum du byed pa'i shes pa de ni bya ba byas pa'i phyir thob pa yin te/ de la brgyad pa ni yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /gal te gnas 'di rnyed na ni mnyam pa nyid shes pa 'di

la brtag cing brgal ba med do/ /smras pa/ 'di skad du brgyad pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o zhes kyang zer na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la snga ma dang phyi ma

dang / phyi ma dang snga ma ji ltar 'thun par 'gyur/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po brgyad pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o zhes bya ba de ni ji ltar las dang po pa la bshad pa de

ltar bstan to/ /ci nas sems can rnams 'jug par 'gyur ba de ltar bstan to/ /ci nas skye bo mang pos go bar 'gyur ba de ltar bstan to/ /ci nas theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'bar bar 'gyur ba de ltar bstan to/ /brgyad pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni

theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa thams cad dang / /lan cig phyir 'ong ba thams cad dang / phyir

mi 'ong ba thams cad dang / dgra bcom pa thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar

mi 'gro'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang nyan thos gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis mnan par sems pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims zil gyis mnan par 'dod par zad de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang rtsod par sems su zad do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na gang rgyal po'i bu dang rtsod par sems pa de ni/ rgyal po dang rtsod par sems par zad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis mnan par sems pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims zil gyis

mnan par sems par zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thub par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na mi la la zhig rkang lag med par gyur la 'di skad du/ bdag 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol

gyi 'gram du mchong bar bya'o zhes zer na/ de skad zer ba de la mi de ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis nga rgyal byed de bla bar rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas gang 'di skad du/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis

gnan par bya'o zhes zer na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di ltar de ni bla bar rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rgya mtsho dug can pa dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar mi de rkang lag rnams med bzhin du rgya mtsho la mchong

bar 'dod pa de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams med bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis non par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po sems can

tshul khrims 'chal pa dpag tu med pa dag 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims la dgod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig / smras

pa/ 'di lta ste/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang / dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog tu 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang / yod par 'du shes pa dang / med par 'du shes pa'i

tshig te/ nyon mongs pa de dag dang gzhan rnams yod na 'chal pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba rab tu phye'o/ /de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dpag tu med pa rnams tshul khrims la dgod par 'dod cing theg pa 'di la zhugs te/ tshul khrims

dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de ni nyan thos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis zil gyis mnan par sla ba ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ming tsam gyis kyang nyan thos

rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis gnon to/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims kyis zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ji ltar zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la zag pa med pa'i tshul

khrims ni bdag nyid la phan pa'i phyir bskyed pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ni sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du yongs su bsngos pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyis zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe

dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims tshad nges pa zhig sgrub tu zin na ni/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la/ de'i tshul khrims kyang pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ gang gi phyir sems can dpag tu

med pa rnams kyi ched du yongs su sngo ba de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims des zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba na srog chags kyi rigs srin bu me khyer thams cad kyi 'od zil

gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas kyang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa nas 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bar

rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi 'od kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba na skar ma'i gzugs thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

yongs su bsngos pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi khyad par

yang skyed na/ rang gi spyod yul la spyod pas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa yin par rig par bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi skyed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems

dpa' la ji skad ces bya/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems kyi rgyud lung du ma bstan pa la gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /gal te nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid du yongs su sngo na ni de'i tshe byang chub

sems dpa' rang gi spyod yul spong ba yin no/ /gal te lhag pa'i bsam pa nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngos pa zhig yin na ni de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' ro dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ sgyu ma

mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas byis pa zhig bzung la sdong po la bskyon te bskyon nas dum bur rags te sa la gtor na byis pa de'i mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams gang dag yin pa de dag byis pa 'di ni shi ste/ phyin cad mi mthong ngo snyam nas

sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byis pa ma shi ba de la shi ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che las nyams te/ nyan thos

kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa yang shi ba ji lta ba bzhin du rig par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi tshul khrims gang

yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims gang yin pa'i tshul khrims 'di dag la tha dad du dbye bar 'dod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos nyid dang / de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du na ni tha dad du dbye bar kyang mi 'dod do/ /smras pa/ 'o na ji ltar tha dad du

dbye bar 'dod/ smras pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims tha dad du dbye bar 'dod do/ /de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyis

byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims zil gyis gnon te/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims

gang yin pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zil gyis gnon cing spa bkong nas gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des 'dir sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ni

mchog ces bya/ gtso bo dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la ri'i rgyal po'i yon tan gang dag yod pa de dag ni ri gzhan dag la med de/ des na ri rnams kyi nang na

ri'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming thob ste/ ri'i rgyal po gangs ris ni/ ri'i rgyal po gangs ri zhes bya ba'i ming thob bo/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du nyan thos kyi tshul khrims dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba dang bral ba yin

la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba dang ma bral te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob bo/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul

khrims kyis ni nyan thos kyi tshul khrims dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims zil gyis gnon to/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir zil gyis gnon/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di ltar gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyis nyan thos rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims zil gyis gnon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa

ti'i bu legs so legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kho na'i mthus sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsngags pa byed pa dang / spro ba smra ba ni legs te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims

kyis nyan thos kyi tshul khrims dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims zil gyis gnon to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa gnas

brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bus ji skad bshad pa bzhin du khyod kyis long shig /kun chub par gyis shig /zung shig /kun dga' bo gal te bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyis gzhan mu stegs can dang / byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / nyan

thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bar gyi tshul khrims zil gyis gnon pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des/ gal te ri'i rgyal po ri rab tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du 'phangs te/ bar der 'dug par byed na bden pa'i tshig gis 'dug go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo byang

chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims de dag thams cad kyi mchog ces brjod pa yin zhing gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

las le'u gsum pa'o// //bam po bzhi pa/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di dang nye ba'i 'bum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos ston cing bzhugs pa zhig mthong ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das
