smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir sems can rnams ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / gang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su mchod cing bsti stang bya ba bshad kyis nyon cig /'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai dUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba

bzhugs te/ 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston pa yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams gtsug pud can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug pud can zhes bya ba yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa na

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams zhi ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi bar bkod pa zhes bya ba yod do/ /'jig

rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i bla ma na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo 'byung

ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mkhregs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan bral ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs pa med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs

pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rtogs pa dang blo gros su ldan pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ngan 'gro dang bral ba na de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad zhi bar

mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i blo gros zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung ba nyid kyis

lha'i dbang por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams zla ba na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams khyad par thob pa na

de bzhin gshegs pa ngan 'gro thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas ngan 'gro thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams legs par snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad sdug par mthong ba zhes

bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas 'jig rten pa thams cad mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa bdud thams cad kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug pud can dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob dang / de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa 'od srung dang / rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lon pa'am/ mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brgya lon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan bzung ba dang / ring bsrel

gyi mchod rten byed du 'jug pa dang / ri mo dang sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / mar me dang / spos dang / me tog dang / dri dang byug pa rnams kyis mchod cing bkur sti byas pa dang / bslab pa 'dzin dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / sdom pa

dang / nye bar gnas pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal par gnas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa yang yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ bde

'gror 'gro bar 'gyur zhing ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba nas/ rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang byang chub kyi sems dran pa nyams

pa zhig gis sdig pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa dag la skur pa 'debs pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / srog gcod pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi nor rku ba dang / sems can dmyal ba mnar med par 'gro ba

dang / ngan song gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / grogs po dang gnyen rnams yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ri mo'i sku gzugs dang / 'jim pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug cing / byed du bcug

nas kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems gtso bor byas te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan par gyur nas zla ba yar gyi tshes brgyad nas brtsams te bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng

ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dang / sil snyan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mtshan lan gsum nyin lan gsum du mchod de/ sems can de dag thar par bya ba'i phyir ci nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye

shes kyis ni mkhyen/ lha'i snyan gyis ni gsan/ lha'i spyan gyis ni gzigs shing sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur gyi ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / legs par bya ba byed kyi ngan par bya ba mi byed par yongs su bsngo zhing / de ltar sems

can ngan song du skyes pa de dag thar par bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gsol ba gdab bo/ /bshags pa dang mthol bas sdig pa bsrabs par gyur cig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos par gyur cig /ngan 'gro thams cad

las yongs su grol bar gyur cig /ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du bdag gi spyod pa dang 'thun par spyod par gyur cig ces de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang

bris pa dang / 'drir bcug pa dang / bcangs pa dang / bklag pa dang / mchod pa de'i phyir sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi smon lam gyi mthus sems can mnar med par 'gro ba dang / ngan song gsum du skyes pa de dag gi rna bar mtshan rnams thos par

'gyur ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus kyang sdig pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gzi brjid kyi mthu dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rjes su dran par gyur nas phyis sdig pa'i las

byed par mi 'gyur te/ de nas sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du spyod pa 'thun par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na chos kyi

rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan mang po dang ldan zhing nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhin du bsam pa thams cad 'grub ste/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad gcod par byed bde 'gro'i sgo dang / sangs

rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo rnams ni 'byed do/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa dang / smon lam dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs pas mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brgya lon pa 'jig rten

gyi khams sna tshogs na gnas pa dag mnyan cing mchod pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa nyid kyis ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar te bde 'gror bkod par 'gyur na/ gang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir gzhug pa dang / gzhan la rgya

cher yang dag par ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ yon tan de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos yongs su bzung bar 'gyur na/ de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i yon tan de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs

par brjod par sla ba ma yin no/ /rgyal po chen po de lta bas na yon tan 'di dag la ltos la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /bshad par bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi phyed par bya'o/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa la rtag tu mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par gzung bar bya'o/ /'khor ba las yid skyo zhing bag yod pa dang / 'khor ba skad cig mar yid la byed pa dang ldan par bya'o/ /yang rgyal po chen po 'dod pa

la bsten pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar sdug bsngal ba/ skye ba dang 'gag pa'i sdug bsngal dang / mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal

dang / dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dang / gcad pa dang / gzhom pa dang / brdung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsreg pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ 'du byed thams cad yongs su spangs te/ 'gro dgos pas rgyal po chen po khyod kyis snying brtse ba gtso bor bya ba

dang / chos dang thar pa 'dod par bya'o/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'jam dpal la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so/ /chos kyi char phab pas bdag cag tshim par bgyis

rangs par bgyis/ byang chub la rab tu bzhag pas bag yod par bgyis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /

klog pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dri ba po dang / 'chang ba po dang / klog pa po de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams kyis mchod na bcom

ldan 'das de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ rgyal po'am/ blon po'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la la zhig gis

chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas bcangs pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / yang dag par bstan na des yon tan chen po brgyad thob par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gang dag 'jig rten na nad dang gnod pa de dag

de la thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byung ba dang / gang 'jig rten na gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / sha za mdangs 'phrog pa de dag thams cad byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gshed byed dang / byad dang / sngags dang / ro langs gzhan gyi

gnod pa de dag de'i lus la gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad de la dga' zhing mgu bar gyur nas de'i don thams cad 'grub

par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar 'gyur ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / lag na rdo rjes yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas su skye zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan chen po de brgyad thob

par 'gyur ro/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mchod pa dang / mngon sum du mchod pas lo 'bum gyi bar du mchod par 'gyur ro/ /gang yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rin

po che sna bdun las byas pas gang bar byas te/ lha'i phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / sil snyan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis lo 'bum du bkur sti byas te rjed cing mchod pa bas gang chos kyi

rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan na de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de

dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzhog cing / bzhag nas kyang lha'i lo stong du yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar rjed cing mchod pa bas/ gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam yang nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang /

'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan la rgyas par byed na de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher brjod par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /zhing stong bye ba gzhan du gnas pa yi/ /

sangs rgyas mkhas pa mtha' yas bye ba dag /sems can rnams kyi phyir ni dgongs mdzad cing / /ngan 'gro las ni sems can thar bar mdzad/ /bstir med las la gnas shing sbyin byed dag /las byas nas ni ngan 'gror song ba rnams/ /de dag thar bar bya phyir

chos 'dod pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag mchod par bgyi/ /ri mor mchod rten rnam pa sna tshogs byos/ /gser dang dngul dang de ltar lugs rnams dang / /'jim pa'i sku gzugs dag ni byed bcug nas/ /mchod pa sna tshogs kyis ni mchod par gyis/ /

me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dang / /mar me sil snyan dri dang spos kyis mchod/ /shes rab che bas bsngo ba dag kyang gyis/ /mdo sde bshad cing 'dir yang bzhugs par gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs dang mdo sde'i gzi brjid kyis/ /sdig pa'i

las las sems can de thar gyis/ /bla med byang chub reg par 'gyur bar du/ /dag pa'i gnas su skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ /sngon gyi las rnams rjes su dran 'gyur zhing / /dran nas mkhas pa sdig pa byed mi 'gyur/ /mi yi byang chub sems dpas mdo sde 'di/ /

bshad pa des ni bsod nams mang du thob/ /de ni lha rnams kun gyis bsrung bar 'gyur/ /de yi lus 'di la ni nad mi 'byung / /de yi rgyal srid kun la gnod mi 'byung / /khyim dang grong dang grong khyer zhi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni rtag 'dzin pa/ /

sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod ni rtag 'dzin 'gyur/ /gang zhig mchod cing rjed dang 'drir 'jug dang / /las gzhan med par nyan du 'jug pa ni/ /des ni sangs rgyas yang dag mchod par 'gyur/ /des ni myur du byang chub mchog rtogs 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di la the tsom skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ci lus 'dis rgyal srid kyi longs spyod bsgrubs nas slar yang sdug bsngal bsgrub par 'gyur ram/

'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe skyo bar mi 'gyur ram/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba rnams myong bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar skye/ ji ltar 'gum/ ji ltar 'tsho/ ji ltar bde ba sgrub

par 'gyur/ ji ltar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ltad mo can 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu yang 'di la gang yang

skye ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'tsho ba med de/ rigs kyi bu 'di la rga ba dang / 'chi ba med kyi/ 'tsho ba'i khams ni rtag tu lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas so/ /yang las kyi rkyen dang las kyi gzhis skye ba sna tshogs su 'ongs shing 'phos nas bde ba dang / sdug bsngal

myong bar 'gyur te/ bde ba la bde bar 'du shes/ sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du 'du shes/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa la bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i 'du shes skyed mod kyi/ lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das

pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du gyur gyi bar du skyo ba'i sems skyed par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig gos sar pa gyon te/ de la de gyon nas las thams cad byed cing bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang myong bar

'gyur ro/ /yang dus gzhan zhig na gos de rnyings shing mugs te dri ma can mthar bshad par gyur pa dang / des de bor ba'i chos can du shes nas bor ro/ /bor nas yang gos sar pa gsar ma gzhan zhig btsal te gyon no/ /des gyon na yang las byed cing bde ba

dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur nas don dam pa'i gos sra zhing brtan la mi shigs shing mi chod pa gyon par ma gyur bar du gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'di lta bus bskal pa du ma 'das kyang gos de bgos so she'am/ bor ro/ /zhes mi rtog rnam par mi rtog gis de ni

lus kyi dbang du 'gro'o/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'tsho ba'i khams des lus 'jig pa dang / 'gyel ba'i mthar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe lus de bor nas yang sar pa gzhon nu gzhan btsal te/ de de'i las byed cing de bgos nas bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur

ro/ /ji ltar rang gi bsod nams las skyes pa'i gos de 'jam pa dang / sra ba dang / rtsub pa'i bgo ba de bzhin du 'tsho ba'i khams kyis bgo ba lta bu'i lus blangs te/ ji ltar rang gi las kyi rkyen gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa bzhin du lha dang / rgyal po dang / sems

can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ lus de yang 'tsho ba'i khams kyi dbang gis 'gro zhing 'tsho ba'i khams kyis yongs su btang yang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog go/ /rigs kyi bu de

bzhin du lus gos lta bur blta bar bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sbrul ni las kyi rkyen gyis dus kyi mthar shun pa de bor nas rang gi lus kyi gzugs kyis 'gro zhing 'ong ste/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar gyur kyang shun pa de mi rtog /rnam par mi

rtog go/ /de bzhin du 'tsho ba'i khams ni sbrul lta bur blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na shing lo ma dang 'dab mar ldan par gyur pa las/ yang dus kyi rkyen gyis 'jig pa dang ltung bar mthar 'gyur ba'i chos can du gyur nas phyis yang dus kyi rkyen gyis myu gu dang /

yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams len te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du las kyi rkyen gyis skye ba dang 'gag par blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na sems can dag rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / khro ba dang / phrag

dog dang / nga rgyal mang ba dag 'byung ste/ srang dang gzhal ba la g.yo byed par dga' ba 'dod chags kyi rjes su spyod pa dag 'byung ste/ de dag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhis sdig pa mang du byed par 'gyur te/ sdig pa mang du byas nas sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur zhing mi

rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes can dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang ba'i 'du shes can gyis sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/ byis pa'i blo can de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi tshol gyi/ gang de lta bu'i sems can de dag la chos ston pa de dag la

dgod cing kyal ka byed pa mang bar 'gyur gyi/ dad par mi byed/ yid ches par mi byed de/ de lta bu'i sems can de dag ni sdig pa spyod do/ /de dag gis 'tsho ba'i khams des las kyi rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du myong bar 'gyur ba'i bgo ba'i lus blangs nas sdug bsngal la dga' ba'i 'du shes

skyed do/ /rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta ste/ 'di la su yang 'chi ba med/ 'tsho ba med/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur te/ las kyi rgyu las kyi rkyen gyis skye ba dang 'gag par 'gyur ro/ /sems

can de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mdzad nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad

kyang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la bkod do/ /de nas de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sa chen g.yos par gyur to/ /ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol to/ /rgyal po gsal rgyal dang gzhan yang mthu chen po

mthu che ba rdzu 'phrul chen po mang pos lha'i na bza' lnga brgyas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par mchod nas lus 'dar bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad nyes pa la nyes so zhes so sor bshags

te bslab pa la yi dam bca' bar bya ste/ ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis 'di skad du smras so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba thams cad las slar log pa/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las sgrol ba/ grol ba thams cad la phyag bgyi'o/ /phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom

ldan 'das slan chad bdag cag skye ba'i 'khor bar sdug bsngal myong bar spro bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams

las grol bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag nan tan snying por byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dkon mchog gsum la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par byos shig /'du byed thams cad mi rtag cing sgyu ma lta bur shes par byos shig /dam

pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la spro bar byos shig /mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / bkur sti mang bar byos shig /sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying rje bar shes par byos shig /chos smra ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par byos shig /dge ba'i

bshes gnyen la bla mar 'du shes bskyed par byos shig /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la bya ba dang / sgom pa dang / rgyas par byos shig /rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal thams cad dang / skye ba thams cad dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid

mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa chen po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i zhags pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la bsgrub par byos shig /bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byos shig /rigs

kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa cig yud tsam pa bzung bas kyang sems can rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol zhing bde 'gror 'gro ste ngan 'gror mi 'gro bar 'gyur na/ gang dag dgod pa dang / ku re dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo rnams yid

kyis yongs su spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchog tu mos pas rim gro byed cing lhag pa'i bsam pas bzhugs te/ 'phags pa'i nye bar gnas pa yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas nas gso sbyin yang dag par blangs te/ spyod pa de dag ngan song gsum du mi skye zhing /

bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi'i bde ba myong nas sdug bsngal mthar byas te/ rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ bud med kyi lus nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon

mongs par gyur pa la la zhig nyin gcig gam nyi ma phyed dam/ yud tsam yang rung ste/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba yang dag par len cing bslab pa 'dzin par byed na de dag thams cad bud med kyi dngos po dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams

cad rnam par bzlog ste/ sdug bsngal mthar byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi yi dam 'cha' ba dang / bslab pa

'dzin pa yang dag par len par byed pa ni yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dang ldan pa yin na/ byis pa dag gis ni de mi shes so/ /de nas de'i tshe na bar snang las sgra chen po byung bar gyur pa dang / 'khor de dag thams cad kyis e ma'o e ma'o zhes dam pa'i

sgra byung nas me tog dang / dri'i char chen po rab tu phab bo/ /sems can 'bum tshang ba rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do/ /gzhan yang sems can bye ba rnams

sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba yid la byas shing sems dang po bskyed par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa

dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag dbugs phyung ste/ bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan rnams

thos te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos smra ba dang / 'chang ba dang / 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / sgrogs pa de dag gi yul lam/ grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang rnams bdag cag gi lus dang srog dang yang bsngos te/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab

par bgyi/ don thams cad grub par bgyi/ nor dang 'bru rnams legs par bsgrub par bgyi/ thams cad du mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi/ nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi/ dran pa dang / stobs dang / spro ba stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis de dag la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis byos shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces

bka' stsal pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang nyan thos chen po rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang /

lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs skyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo

rdzogs so// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud d+ha d+ha rma a tsin t+ya nir de shA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/ bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'dus pa la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas de na byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'dus pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam las byung ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas

'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi chags par spyod

pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis mkhyen pas byang chub sems dpa'

ud pa la'i snying po la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyi brlabs nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi shugs su gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang bas snang bar gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis kun tu khyab par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa la gnas par

gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings su 'jug cing 'bab pa dang ldan par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyis yul la zhugs par gyur/ chags pa med pa'i rnam par spyod pa med pa bcu rdul yab la gnas par gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung

gcig nas gcig tu 'ba' zhig shes par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul brjod du med pa la spyod cing bsgrub par gyur to/ /de nas ud pa la'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa rtogs shing shes nas/ yid la chags pa med pa'i dbyings

su bsgrubs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas chos thams cad kyi sgrib pa spangs pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang ldan par zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su rtogs shing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po bgos

nas sems can thams cad la lta zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i yi dam gyi dkyil 'khor brtsams pa dang / skad cig ma'i mthar song ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa dang / mi zad pa mthong ba dang / thams

cad mkhyen pa mngon du bya ba dang / gzungs thams cad snang bar gyur pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa rtogs nas ud pa la'i snying po byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi mthus pad ma'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i

sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod pa dpag tu med do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par sprul pa chen po la gnas so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i mtshan thams cad kyi mdzad pa brnyes so/ /sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi bsam pa dang ldan zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi brjod du med par ston to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi

chos bsam du med pa la gnas so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgra dbyangs dpag tu med par 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams brjod du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings rtogs shing chud do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon

par shes pa thams cad kyi khyu mchog sangs rgyas so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' sgrib pa med pa la 'jug pa mdor bsdus pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang

dbus med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag cing ma brnyogs pas thams cad du 'gro ba spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la

chags pa med pa'i spyan mtha' dang dbus med pas spyan mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chags pa med pa'i snyan mtha' dang dbus med pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgra sgrib pa med par gsan pa dang / sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis shangs kyi skye mched mtha' dang dbus med pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnga' mchog brnyes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ljags che zhing srab pa mtha' dang dbus med pas chos thams cad kyi dbyings su sgra dbyangs kyis 'gro

ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pas las kyi lhag ma ma lus shing sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa ston cing dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yid kyi las mtha' dang

dbus med pas chos kyi dbyings kyi sku dbyer med cing dus gsum la ma chags pas rjes su 'gro ba rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa la gnas pa mtha' dang dbus med pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul

pa dang cho 'phrul mi zad pa ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa mtha' dang dbus med pas brjod du med pa'i rgyan byin gyis brlabs shing nyon mongs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa

dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa dang / chos kyi yongs su rdzogs shing ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa'i chos

yongs su rdzogs pas chos thams cad mngon par byang chub pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho bar ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi

khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i tshe ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par byung bar ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs shing mngon par byang chub par

ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis sems can rnams ji ltar smin cing 'dul ba'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen nas mgu bar mdzad pa ston

pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i dmigs pa ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan

cing / khyu mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thams cad rnam par dag pa ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da

ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus dang / dad pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa'i rim pa dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyis rigs mngon par mkhyen pa ston pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs

rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus las mi 'da' ba bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba las mi 'da'

ba dang / dus de rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas yang dag par dge ba'i rnam par smin pa'i rnam par smin pa las mi 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung

ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du cho 'phrul ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas sems can rnams ji ltar dad pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i byin gyi rlabs ston pa

dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas btang snyoms la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen

nas ji ltar rab tu dang ba'i sems can rnams rab tu 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas nyon mongs shing gdul dka' ba'i sems can la mi btsams pas 'dul ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas

sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dmigs pa ston pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus de nas dus las mi 'da' ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul mtshungs pa med

cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ skyil mo krung gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba gcig yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / 'od zer gcig gis 'jig rten

gyi khams thams cad ma lus par snang ba dang / sku gcig gis sku thams cad du ston pa dang / phyogs gcig gis gnas dmigs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sku dang / ye shes gcig gis chos thams cad bsgribs pa med

par chud pa dang / dus mkhyen nas sems gcig bskyed pas chos thams cad kyi dbyings kyis ma lus par khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba tshad med pa'i rjes su song zhing gom pa gcig la de kho na nyid ston pa dang / dus gsum thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing

phun sum tshogs pas khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas 'gro ba thams cad dang mi 'dre zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid gcig ste/ gnyis su med par spyod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams

kyi yul mtshungs pa med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'jug cing smon lam mngon par sgrub

pa mkhyen pa dang / lus med pa'i lus mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad gnyis su med pas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / sems can bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa la sems can 'dul ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /

chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul thams cad ma lus pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud pa dang 'gyur ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / yul thams cad la mngon par 'du

mi byed cing las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i dbyings su mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba yang ma yin par mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos

thams cad skye ba med pa la skye zhing 'god pa'i mtshan nyid rkyen dang 'du ba tshogs te byung ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa tshad med pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ dus gsum thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho 'phrul gsum sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / gzungs dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i

so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / dus thams cad du sems can thams cad

la rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mnyam pas phan par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can thams cad 'dul ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / chos thams cad kyi

dbyings la mi chags par gnas pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / skad cig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang nyi ma gcig la dus gsum gyi bskal

pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa tshad med pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod

par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ bdud kyi rgol ba bcom zhing gtor ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / gzhan mur 'dug dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa shin tu bzod

par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / sems can thams cad 'dul zhing tshim par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs

pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rab tu phigs shing mkhyen pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / 'jig rten

gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sku gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par phye ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyangs kyi

yan lag thams cad kyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i gnas dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / sems can gti mug med cing dang ba'i sems can thos pas 'dul ba shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig bzhin du ba spu'i khams thams cad nas rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa de snyed gshegs pa gnas pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu gnas 'di bzhin du rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams

thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems can 'byin pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi

gnas gcig gi rab tu phra ba'i rdul la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rang bzhin gyis 'tsher bas chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing sems can 'dul ba rgyun mi gcod la

gtong ba med kyang gnod pa med cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang gnod pa med de/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul de rgyas par byas pa'ang med/ 'jig rten gyi khams chung ngur byas pa'ang med pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs shing mkhyen nas gnas pa ste/

'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po'o/ /mun pa med pa'i dbyings su de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mun pa dang bcas pa snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab rib

med pa/ rnam par rab rib med pa'i gnas la sems can pha rol 'dzud pa dang / de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rjes su song ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po bcu'o/ /

kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zil gyis gnon pa'i chos kyi bla re chen po bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba shin tu bsgrubs te/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs sngon nas mtho bas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa la mi gnas shing phyi ma'i mtha' ma'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams

kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la gnas pa bcom zhing dus gsum la mi gnas par spyod pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma

tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sna tshogs kyi blang ba med pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyan gcig pa'i ngo bo ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams zad mi shes pas sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams

cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sems can 'dul ba'i don gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzugs dang kha dog mtha' med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na chags pa med par bzhugs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig pa med pa bzhi brnyes te/ bag tsha ba med par gnas nas khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrog ste/ stag chen po ltar rgol ba

rnam par gnon cing / me mar lta bu'i kun tu rtog pas chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal

pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das mod kyi/ 'on kyang ming mang po rnam par rigs pas sems can rnams kyi sbyin gnas sbyong ste/ ji ltar zhugs pa bzhin no/ /de srid du yun ring po nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das rnams la sbyin gnas bskrun pa ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las ring ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i sems can gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran na sku ston par mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che

ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba ste/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin

tu rnam par dag pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi smon lam shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ma chags pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag

cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sems can thams cad phung po las byung bar mdzad pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi

g.yog 'khor shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bsgribs pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa dang /

rnam par gnon par mdzad pa dam pa'i mchog brnyes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras su dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi yul khams thams cad na

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzad pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu rnyed pa'i sems can rnams la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas ston pa dang / dus thams cad du sems can shes kyi sems can la chos ston pa dang / dus thams cad du

sangs rgyas la sems rab tu dang ba'i sems can la tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / dus thams cad du chos mi 'gyur ba'i lam du 'das pa'i sems can la ye shes rtogs par mdzad pa dang / dus thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad la sangs

rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang / dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mi chags par bzhud pa dang / dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la thugs rje chen po rgyun mi gcod pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams rnam par sprul pa la bzhugs pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas sna tshogs su sprul par bzhugs pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi dbyings la

gnas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi yul khams thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi

ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i tshul mi zad pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa tshad med pa brnyes pa'i ye shes kyi rgya

mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi yul gyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / kha dog gi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pas

sngon gyi mtha' nas smon lam spyod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i mthar 'gro ba thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can ma lus pa'i ris

thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi gnon pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin

cing mngon par byung ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thams cad la thugs rje che ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams tshad med pa'i stobs bcu thams cad dang ldan pa'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul bar

zhugs pa'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mdzad pa'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pas 'dul ba'i sems can la 'dul ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di

ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gnyis su med par spyod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid la dbang ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar sems can btul te smin par mdzad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha'i phyir sangs rgyas

yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas par ston pa bcu ste/ bcu gang

zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam

par smin pa mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la gdams pa rjes su bstan pa mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams rnam par spyod pa'i nan tan mtha' yas par ston

pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gdams pa mtha' yas pa bstan pa la 'god pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i rim pa'i khyad par bzhin smon lam gyis 'byung ba mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang /

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la sdud pa dang 'gyur ba mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa dang dad pa bzhin

ston pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu bskal par 'byung ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthus bsdus nas yongs su

snang zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par rig pa mtha' yas pa'i sgo ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mtha' yas par ston pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas

kyi mdzad pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku bstan pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas

kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzung bas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mi 'dzin pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa

dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung gis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis yul gyi dbang gis brtsam pa'i yul thams cad kyis

kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan gyis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhing rtsom pas kyang sems can rnams la

sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsungs pas kyang sems can rnams la

sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu ste/ bcu

gang zhe na/ smon lam rgyun mi gcod cing smon lam brtan pa dang / gnyis su med par bshad pa ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po dang po'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson zhing ma zhum par phyi ma'i mtha' bskal par

'gro zhing yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po gnyis so/ /brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dul bar 'os pa'i sems can gcig gzigs na yang mi

bzhugs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs te/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po gsum mo/ /sems can gyi sems mi 'phrogs pa la thugs rje chen po mnyam pa dang / sems can sems rab tu dang ba la thugs rje chen po mnyam pa ste/

'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bzhi'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang ma yin/ ma byung ba'ang ma yin/ gang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas nam bla na med pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du byang chub kyi sems mi 'jig ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po lnga'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsdus nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo bar 'jug cing 'jig rten gyi

phyir mi spyod pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po drug go/ /thog mar sems kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rjes su lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las la slob ste/ thams cad mkhyen par bsngo zhing nyan thos dang rang

sangs rgyas kyi spyod par ma yin pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bdun no/ /mtha' yas par 'od thams cad kun tu snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad

snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa 'di snang ba thams cad mtshungs pa thams cad mtshungs par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po brgyad do/ /'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad spong

ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba la mi 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i smon lam thams cad mtshungs par 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig cing spros pa thams cad med pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi

snying po dgu'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi yul la dad pas dka' ba dang dka' thub kyi sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs bsrung ba la brtson pas 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam par sdug bsngal thams cad rig pas rig cing stobs dang sa bcu'i bar gyi mthar byung ba

ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi chags par spyod pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gshegs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na bzhugs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na 'chag bzhengs bzhugs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na chos ston pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dang / dga' ldan gnas su gshegs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar

byung ba la yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du tshad med pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gshegs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la

rnam par gzigs shing sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la cho 'phrul gsum ston cing sems can 'dul ba yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gcig gis tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab par gshegs shing sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa

chen po spyod pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab par gshegs shing sems can tshad med pa bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams cad la ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa

ma lus pa thams cad kyi mtha' yas bsdus pa yang mi chags par spyod pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mi chags par spyod pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mchog

dam pa bla na med pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yan lag drug cu mchog

dam pa dang ldan zhing gsung gi yan lag brgya rtsa lnga yongs su bzung ba brgya stong du mas brgyan pa mtha' dang mu med pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / don tshig 'bru rab tu dang ba dang / 'jigs pa med pa chen

pos mi 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med par seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can thams cad la thos pa dang / snang ba dang / shes par mdzad pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs dang / dbang po sna tshogs

kyi rim pa so sor slong zhing 'dul ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yid kyi las stobs bcus brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin chen pos

rgyas shing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan te chags pa med pa'i yul gyi spyod yul ba/ chos kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi yan lag brnyes te/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi

rgyan dang / sems kyi skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi dus gsum ma lus pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams

kyi thugs kyi rgyan dam pa mchog bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod du med pa'i 'od bye ba khrag khrig rab tu btang nas/ 'od zer brjod du med pa gcig nas gcig tu 'od zer gyi dra bar bskor cing zhing med bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams cad du

snang bar byas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mun pa'i rigs ston pa/ 'dzum pa ston pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs du ma kha dog brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa byung bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs

med pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi khams la snang bas shes par byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi bral zhing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gdon mi za ba phyir mi ldog pa brjod du med pa'i

sangs rgyas 'byung zhing bzhugs pa'i sku rnam par dag pas dga' ba med par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gzhan du lung ston pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi

sgrib pa med par mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rab rib med pas 'jig rten thams cad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa ston pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku sgrib pa med cing

rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la ma chags pa mtha' med pa'i chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbung med par chud pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ 'jig rten thams cad de kho na nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba 'jig rten thams cad 'jig rten las

'das par spyod par 'jug pa'i tshig gi lam chad cing brjod du med par chud pa/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang bral ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od tshad med

pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dbyer med pa'i 'od brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyan kha dog sna tshogs du ma'i rkyen kun nas mi 'phrogs pa'i 'od/ 'jig rten thams cad la ma chags pa'i 'od/ tshad med pa sgrib pa med pa'i 'od kyi dkyil

'khor gyi mdzod thams cad khang pa ltar gyur pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan bla na med pa mchog dam pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi kha dog mtha' yas pa/ kha dog 'tsher ba/ kha dog rang bzhin gyis 'tsher ba/ kha

dog tshad med pa/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par byed pa'i kha dog ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi zlog pa'i kha dog dang / kha dog thams cad kyi mchog brnyes pas de las gzhan pa'i kha dog

dang / khams gsum gyi kha dog thams cad khyab pa zil gyis mnan pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba shin tu rnam par dag pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa

dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs dge ba rin po che 'byung ba'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma smad pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pas chos thams cad kyi de kho na mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sgrib

pa med cing rigs rnam par dag pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung zhing 'dus pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs dang / gdung rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku byams

pa chen po'i stobs kyis brgyan pa shin tu dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i sku'i 'du byed nyam rangs pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba blta bas mi ngoms pas/ thugs rje chen po'i thugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi sbyin gnas dang / skyabs med kyi mchog bla na med pa so sor

'dzin pa rnams la thugs brtse zhing phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la ye shes chen po'i byin gyis rlob pa bsod nams chen po 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams mtha' yas pa'i zhing sems can thams cad la yon tan dang ye shes kyi

phung po thams cad rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po dang / bsod nams kyi mtha'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// //'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/ bam po gnyis pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag po dbang gi chos bcu ste/

bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi bdag po dbang gis chos thams cad snang bar mdzad pa dang / mtha' med pa'i tshig dang 'bru la spobs pa chags pa med pa dang / chos ma lus pa thams cad yongs su ston pa ste/ 'di ni sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos dang po'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos ji ltar sems can gnas pa'i 'dul zhing yongs su smin pa de ltar smon lam dang chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i chos

gnyis so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos kyang sems can gcig la yang gnod pa med pa tshad med grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha'i

'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu 'deg pa dang / 'jog pa dang / sad pa dang / 'phen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig dang / phyogs gcig nas gcig tu 'jog kyang sems can gyi khams kun nas gti mi mug

cing the tsom med de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos gsum mo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag po'i sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs te/ rgyan sna tshogs

'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhab lhub dang rgyan ston pa dang / grangs med pa'i bskal par 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du nyon mongs pa med pa'i lus su ston cing lhab lhub dang /

rgyan thams cad kyi kha dog mi zad par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu kun 'brang bar byin gyis rlob pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bzhi'o/ /

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs nas sems can gcig gi phyir brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par skyil mo krung mi 'jig pa gang zag de la dgongs kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang

thugs la skyo ba mi mnga' zhing 'dul ba'i dus su de las mi 'da' ste/ ji ltar gang zag re re la yang de bzhin du rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mthar tshe la dbang ba byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la kun

du bsnyengs pa mi mnga'/ skyo ba mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i gang zag gi phyir rim pas rab tu skyong ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos

lnga'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sems kyi skad cig ma de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'brang zhing gshegs nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'gyur ba rgya mtsho med pa bcu rdul yab ma lus pa

thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gcig tu thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs kyi dra ba bzlog cing tshad med par gshegs te/ chos kyi dbyings ston pa dang / mi 'phrogs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo

bskor ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos drug go/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sems kyi skad cig ma la sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i phyir sems kyi skad cig ma la bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang 'di ltar mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las mngon par sangs rgyas pa'ang med/ mngon du rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'ang med/ slob

pa'i sa la gnas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu phye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrib pa med par rtogs shing rig pa'ang med de/ sems can 'dul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa chen po'i yul rgyun mi gcod cing dpag tu med pa'i ye

shes brnyes te 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bdun no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos gang spyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de snyan gyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang snyan gyi skye mched kyis

sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de shangs kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang shangs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de ljags kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang ljags kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de sku'i skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang

sku'i skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de thugs kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/ gang thugs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de'i bar gyis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sna tshogs su rtsom zhing 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par

phye ba brnyes te/ de bzhin du rtsom pa re res sgrub cing sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rtsom pa gcig ji lta ba bzhin du rtsom pa ma lus pa thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos brgyad do/ /

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang pos rang gi sku'i ba spu gcig gi bu gar sems can re re'i lus kyang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ltar che ba'i sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad bcug cing nang du 'dus par mdzad de/ de la sems can re

res kyang bskal pa grangs med par gnas kyang sems can de dag la gnod pa yang med/ kun tu gnod pa med do/ /'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu gom pa gcig gis gshegs te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gis

sangs rgyas byung zhing sangs rgyas byung ba dang / de dag gis brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das te/ de'i dbang gis sems can gyi snying pos brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shes so/ /de la ba spu'i bu ga'i sems can brjod du med pa dag gcig

nas gcig tu sangs rgyas su gyur te/ gcig nas gcig tu brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing / gcig nas gcig tu brjod du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings ston/ gcig nas gcig tu 'das pa brjod du med pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu ma 'ongs pa brjod du med pa

dang / gcig nas gcig tu da ltar byung ba brjod du med pa snang bar byed/ mtha' dang dbung med pa'i nam mkha'i khams skabs byed pa ston/ sems can thams cad 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / thams cad skye ba'i skye mched dang / bsgribs pa med pa dang / 'dod chags

la yongs su spyod par 'jug pa mkhyen te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos dgu'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag pos chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad mo'i rgyan chen pos brgyan te pad mo'i

snying po'i seng ge'i gdan la de bzhin gshegs pa re re bzhugs pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang / sku dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par rol pa ston te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa

gcig pa de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam par sems can gyi snying po re re sems kyi skad cig ma la byin gyis rlob bo/ /sems kyi skad cig ma gcig ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi skad cig ma thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /ji ltar pad ma'i le'u

dang / rnam par dag cing mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / med bcu rdul yab brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten

gyi khams su rtsom pa sna tshogs kyi rim pa dang / med bcu rdul yab brjod du med pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa dang / sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs med pa dang / rigs med bcu rdul yab tshad med pa dang / grangs med pa'i dus 'gyur ba dang / mi

chags pa ston pa dang / tshad med pa'i blo rgyas pa'i dad pa dang / skad cig ma sna tshogs dang / gnas med pa dang / skad cig ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / tshad med par gshegs pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma dang / sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la thams cad

ston te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchod du mdzad pa ni mi mnga'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi

bdag po'i dbang gi chos bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang gis bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan mtshan re re nas

yongs su dag nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ 'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang po'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs

pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

sangs rgyas kyi bdag po 'gro ba thams cad gang gis kyang zil gyis mi gnon pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par

rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad gti mug med par ston pa

yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs

rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa bcu'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i

sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs ma yin pa'i chos thams cad mkhyen nas spros pa med pa dang / dge ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs

ston cing snang bar mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa dang po'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad bltar med pa dang / phan tshun shes par mi rung ba dang / ma bcing ba dang / ma grol ba dang / gzung

du med pa dang / reg par mi rung ba dang / ma byung ba'i chos thams cad la mnga' dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad yang dag pa nyid dang / de kho na dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i

chos thams cad dang / bdag med pa dang / gzung ba med pa'i chos rnams kyi de kho na'i mtha' la chags pa med pa'i dbang du gyur pa de la dbang gis chen po bslabs te/ bslab pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing chos thams cad la gzigs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa gnyis pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma thams cad kyi mtha' dang bral zhing mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa/ mtshan ma mngon par mkhyen pas mi chags pa de'i ngo bo nyid dang ngo bo nyid med pa

dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid smra ba'i tshul gyis rjes su song ba/ grangs med pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma'i tshogs kyi sku rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyi zhing thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang spyod pa'i mtshan ma zad par ston pa/ mun pa'i 'du shes kyi phung po

yang dag par rab tu 'chang ba mun pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la sgron ma chen pos snang ba ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa gsum pa'o/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba la ma chags pa dang /

'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la mi gnas pa/ de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid ma byung ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byung ba snang bar mdzad pa/ brjod du med par

bstan pa/ de ltar tshad med pa'i rigs kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi phyir lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yul kun tu gzigs pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bzhi pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las mngon par 'du mi byed pa/ blang ba med pa dang / rgya med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu song ba/ ma nges pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod dang / grangs kyi spyod pa las legs par

tshogs mtha' yas pa sgrub pa dang / sna tshogs kyi rim pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i grangs su gtogs pa'i rjes su song ba/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi lta ba tshad med mtha' yas pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs mngon par 'du mdzad pa/ chos kyi

dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams 'dul zhing rnam par rig par byed pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa lnga'o/ /chos thams cad bltar med pa dang / sna tshogs med par song ba de ni med med par song ba/

ma byung bar song ba/ mtshan nyid med par song ba/ sna tshogs med par song ba/ rgyan med par song ba/ blang ba med par song ba/ ngo bo nyid med par song zhing chos thams cad mkhyen te/ chos kyi klong las rim par 'byin pa rab tu mkhyen pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos dang mi

'gal bar mdzad pa/ yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med par lta ba/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ ye shes kyis ma lus par gzigs pa/ chos thams cad dbang gis snang bar mdzad cing de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi 'pho ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa drug pa'o/ /dus gcig tu mtshan ma gcig phan tshun rtogs shing mkhyen pa de chos gsha' mar 'jug pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa rnam par dag pa/ chos gsha' ma nyid dang /

dus thams cad du mi gnas pa de la nyi ma gcig dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo gcig dang / lo brgya dang / bskal pa sdud pa dang 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'ang ma yin/ ldog pa'ang ma yin/ tshad med pa'i dus dang / nyi ma gcig dang / yud tsam gyi dus dang /

snga dro dang / nyi ma phyed kyi dus dang / phyem red dang / srod dang / nam gyi gung dang / tho rangs kyi dus dang / nyi ma dang / grangs su gtogs pa'i dus dang / zhag bdun dang / zla ba phyed kyi dus dang / zla ba gcig dang / lo gcig dang / lo brgya'i dus dang / bskal

pa gcig gi dus dang / tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ brjod du med pa'i dus dang / phyi ma'i dus kyi mtha'i bar dus chos ston te/ chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'ang med ldog pa'ang med/ rgyun kyang mi gcod/ sbyor ba'ang med/ mtshams su'ang

mi 'gyur/ mi 'dor/ mi 'pho/ mi g.yo/ ring ba'ang ma yin/ de mtha' la yang gnas pa ma yin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bdun pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa

thams cad dang / tshad med pa'i mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa grangs med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa gnas pa med pa dang /

so so yang dag par rig pa mtha' yas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa kun nas gzung ba med pa dang / de kho na nyid so so yang dag par rig pa dang / tshig dang / tshul dang / rtog pa so so'i yang dag par rig pa dang / chos

thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa dang / ji ltar bsam pa dang / dad pa dang / dbang po dang / ji ltar btags pa'i chos rnams dang / chos kyi gzhung gi mtshams ston pa dang / de dang de dag tu brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong

gi thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma'i mdo yang dag par rab tu ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa brgyad pa'o/ /ming med pa dang / ming dang / rigs dang / 'byung ba yang chos thams cad kyi ming dang /

'byed pa dang / khams 'bar ba dang / mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / 'das pa med pa'i ming dang / ma 'ongs pa med pa'i ming dang / da ltar byung ba med pa'i ming dang / sems can med pa'i ming dang / zhing med pa'i ming dang / chos med

pa'i ming dang / yon tan med pa'i ming dang / byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i ming dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i ming dang / grangs med pa'i ming dang / grangs med pa ma yin pa'i ming dang / ma byung ba'i ming dang / mi 'gog pa'i ming dang / med pa'i ming

dang / med pa ma yin pa'i ming dang / gcig ma yin pa'i ming dang / rnam pa thams cad ma yin pa'i ming rang bzhin gyis brjod du med pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni phyogs ma yin/ brda ma yin/ ngag gi lam gyi sgra dang bral ba/ sgra byung ba thams cad kyis

ma bsgrubs pa/ ma bskyed pa dang / sna tshogs su bskyed pa dang / rnam pa gcig ma yin pa dang / rnam pa mang po ma yin pa dang / smra ba thams cad brjod du med pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ kun tu mi rtog pa'i yul mngon par 'du mi byed pa

dang ldan pa/ rtog pa dang / kun tu rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa/ smra ba thams cad la mi gnas pa gnas pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa dgu'o/ /gzugs kyi chos thams cad

ma skyes par mkhyen te/ tshor ba ma yin/ spros pa ma yin/ grangs ma yin/ 'du shes kyi spyod pa ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ len pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ rang bzhin gyis zhi bar rab tu mkhyen/ skye mched med par 'jug pa dang /
