ji tsam la bab pa gzigs shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis mthong nas yid ches te mi ring bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyi ming ci yin bdag la ston cig /rigs kyi bu des smras pa/

btsun pa rab 'byor khyod la bdag gi ming gis ci zhig bgyi/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la zhus shig dang de khyod la lan 'debs so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang ming thams cad ni ming ma mchis pa'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ming thams cad ni kun brtags pa dang /

yang dag pa ma lags pa ste/ gang kun brtags pa dang / yang dag pa ma lags pa de la ming 'di zhes ji skad bgyi/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ming gang yin pa de yang kun brtags pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa yin nam/ smras pa/

btsun pa rab 'byor de ni de bzhin te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na ming phan tshun tha dad pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ming tha dad pa ji lta bu yin/ smras

pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lar ni mthu zhes bgyi'o/ /la lar ni sdud pa zhes bgyi'o/ /la lar ni thams cad du snang ba zhes bgyi'o/ /la lar ni dri ma med pa zhes bgyi'o/ /la lar ni don thams cad ston pa zhes bgyi'o/ /

la lar ni nyams pa med pa zhes bgyi'o/ /la lar ni mchod pa po zhes bgyi'o/ /la lar ni mngon sum pa zhes bgyi'o/ /la lar ni byi ru 'dzin ces bgyi'o/ /la lar ni rnam par rgyal ba chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /la lar ni sgra chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /la lar ni dpag tu ma

mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na ming tha dad pa dpag tu ma mchis so/ /de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i

ming tha dad pa yang dpag tu ma mchis so/ /de bzhin du phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub

kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na ming tha dad pa dpag tu ma mchis te/ de bas na btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang ming thams cad ni ming ma mchis pa dang / kun brtags pa

dang / yang dag pa ma lags pa de ltar rig par bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ni de na yon gnas 'di lta bu dag 'khod pa las na rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no/ /

rigs kyi bu des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig rten na yon gnas gang lags pa mkhyen tam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar bdag gis spobs pa de bzhin du bstan par bya ste/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos la zhugs pa/ sems 'khrul pa med pa gang yin pa de

dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas yin no/ /smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa de dag ni yon gnas yongs su rdzogs pa ma lags so/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yon gnas yongs su rdzogs pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor sems can

thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po yang skye la sems can gang yang mi dmigs pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi tshul mi gcod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni

'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba la brtson pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/ /ye shes mi zad pa dang / shes rab mi zad pa dang / bsod nams mi zad pa dang / spobs pa mi

zad pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/ /so so'i skye bo'i grogs mi bgyid la 'phags pa'i grogs bgyid pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/ /gang dag mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams kyi ye shes mthong ba

rnam par dag par 'gyur ba gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi phyi bzhin du rtag tu 'brang ba'i lha nges pa la ma zhugs pa gang yin pa des yon gnas kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bzod pa gsol te/ btsun pa rab 'byor ba dag khyod kyi slad bzhin du 'brang bar mi bgyid do zhes byas so/ /de nas rigs kyi bu des lha de la 'di skad ces smras

so/ /lha khyod ci'i phyir btsun pa rab 'byor la bzod pa gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du btsun pa rab 'byor gyi phyi bzhin 'brangs kyang / bdag gis yon gnas kyis bstan pa 'di lta bu sngon chad ma thos te/ de bas na da ltar yon gnas

kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ gang dang gang na yon gnas kyis yongs su dag par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sdud par byed pa'i chos

'di lta bu dag thos par 'gyur ba de dang der 'gro'o snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lha de'i sems bskyed pa de la rjes su yi rangs nas lha de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha khyod kyi sems sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag la btud pa de ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /lha

bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems snad par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pas ci byar yang med do/ /lha gal te bdag sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na ni bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zhig

mod/ lha gzhan yang khyod kyis ni sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos par byed pa dang / thos pa rnams kyang chud mi za bar byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa 'di ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsten par bya'o/ /de nas rigs kyi bu des lha de la 'di

skad ces smras so/ /lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'grub par dka' ste/ de ni go cha ngan ngon tsam gyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/ /lhas smras pa/ skyes bu dam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par dka' ba yin mod

kyi/ 'on kyang ci nas bdag gis btsal ba don yod par 'gyur bar bdag gis bsgrub par bya'o/ /smras pa/ lha khyod kyis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ smras pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa las rab tu grol bar bya ba

dang / sems can thams cad kyi phung po'i khur khyer ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad rtogs par bya ba'i phyir de ltar bsgrub par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu des smras pa/ lha sems can du 'du shes pa la ni sems can thams cad la sems

snyoms pa med do/ /nyon mongs par 'du shes pa la ni sems can thams cad rab tu grol bar byed pa med do/ /phung por 'du shes pa la ni sems can thams cad kyi phung po'i khur khyer ba med do/ /kun brtags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba can la ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pa

med do/ /bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pa la ni sdug bsngal thams cad rtogs par byed pa med do/ /de nas lha de gdams ngag 'di bstan pas 'thun pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob bo/ /de nas lha des rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir

sgo gang der lha'i me tog sil mas gtor to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha bdag gis khyod kyi bsam pa ma shes nas nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyi gtam byas te dga' ba skyed pa de khyod kyis kyang bzod pa gyis shig /de nas lha

des 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal gyis sems can su'i tshod kyang ma 'dzin cig /sems can su la yang rung ste bsam pa ma brtags par chos ma 'chad cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma thos pa ni sla'i byang chub

'dod pas nyan thos kyi theg pa thos pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor yun ring du bkres pa ni sla'i kha zas dug dang 'dres pa zos pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du ma thos pa ni sla'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas nyan thos kyi theg pa thos pa ni de lta

ma yin no/ /de nas rigs kyi bu des yang bud med kyi gzugs dang / kha dog snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du bstan nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis bsod snyoms ma phul gyi bar du re zhig gzhes shig /de nas bud med de rang

gi khyim du song ste/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas blangs nas phyir byung ste/ 'ongs nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor bsod snyoms 'di bzhes la 'dod chags dang bcas par yang ma mdzad cig /'dod chags dang bral bar yang ma mdzad

cig /zhe sdang dang bcas par yang ma mdzad cig /zhe sdang dang bral bar yang ma mdzad cig /gti mug dang bcas par yang ma mdzad cig /gti mug dang bral bar yang ma mdzad cig /nyon mongs pa dang bcas par yang ma mdzad cig /nyon mongs pa dang bral bar

yang ma mdzad cig /gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis sdug bsngal yongs su ma mkhyen/ kun 'byung ba ma spangs/ 'gog pa mngon sum du ma bgyis/ lam ma bsgoms na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

bzhi ma bsgoms/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma bsgoms na/ de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /gal te btsun

pa rab 'byor gyis 'jig tshogs kyang ma dkrugs la bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam yang thob na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis ma rig pa ma bshig par rig pas rnam par grol ba mngon sum du mdzad pa dang / 'du byed zad par

ma mdzad par 'dus ma byas mngon sum du mdzad pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i rgyu ba la ma brten par rnam par grol bar gyur pa dang / ming dang gzugs su sgro ma btags par khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa dang / skye mched drug la ma brten par rnam par

thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid bsgoms pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa la ma brten par rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa bsgoms pa dang / tshor ba ma dmigs par rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa mngon sum du mdzad pa dang / sred pa mi dmigs par de

bzhin nyid yongs su mkhyen pa dang / len pa rlom sems su ma mdzad par len pa med pa kun mkhyen pa dang / srid pa mi 'byung ba'i tshul du yongs su mkhyen pa dang / skye ba mi skye bar yongs su mkhyen pa dang / rga shi brjod du med pa'i tshul du yongs su mkhyen pa

de lta bur srid pa'i yan lag rnams kun mkhyen na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyang ma gzigs/ chos kyang ma gsan/ dge 'dun la yang mi rton na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /gal te btsun

pa rab 'byor gyis 'phags pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis so so'i skye bo mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /gal te btsun pa rab 'byor nyid 'di nas kyang med par gyur la pha rol tu yang mi skye na de lta na bsod

snyoms 'di bzhes shig /gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug mnyam pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen la/ nyon mongs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti

mug mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /gal te btsun pa rab 'byor so so'i skye bo'i sa las kyang ma 'das la 'phags pa'i sa la yang ma zhugs na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /gal te btsun pa rab 'byor snang ba yang

ma lags/ snang bar 'gro ba yang ma lags/ 'khor ba la yang ma zhugs/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi 'thob/ du smra ba yang ma lags/ bden par smra ba yang ma lags na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis zag

pa yang zad par mi mdzad la mi zad pa yang 'khrug par mi mdzad/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams las kyang mi g.yo la rten pa ma mchis par yang nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa bsam gtan du mdzad/ thams cad la yang rtag tu smon pa mi mnga' la chos

rnams kyang sems kyis shin tu thugs su chud na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /btsun pa rab 'byor gal te khyod kyis gang gi phyir rab tu byung ba'i chos de ma rtogs na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /btsun pa rab 'byor gyi nyon mongs pa med pa gang lags

pa dang / sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa med pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gal te nyon mongs pa med pa 'di gnyis la yon gnas ches lhag pa ma mchis na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /'phags pa rab 'byor la yon gnas

yin par 'du shes skyed pa gang lags pa de dag ni btsun pa rab 'byor la med pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa 'debs pa ste/ gal te btsun pa rab 'byor khyod chos de lta bu dang ldan na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sgo gang de g.yos

par byas nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste 'di skad ces smras so/ /che zhe gang dag yang dag par smra ba na 'di lta bu'i chos ldan par smra ba de dag ni bdag la yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no/ /de skad ces smras nas bsod snyoms de blangs so/ /de nas bud med des tshe dang

ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang dag mnyam pa nyid kyis bsod snyoms len pa'i yon gnas de dag ni dkon no/ /smras pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams ni mnyam pa nyid 'di sun phyung ste smad nas phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro

bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis ci las bsams te gang dag chos 'di sun phyung ste smad nas phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smra/ smras pa/ lha 'di ji snyam du

sems/ sgyu ma'i chos 'ga' zhig la 'di ni rgyu dang bcas pa'o/ /'di ni rgyu med pa'o zhes sun 'byin pa'am/ smod par byed dam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ lha de bzhin du chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs na bdag gis

sun dbyung ba'am smad du ci zhig yod/ lha gzhan yang bdag ni sems can thams cad kyis yang dag pa'am/ yang dag pa ma yin pa brjod pa'i sgra de dag thams cad dang mnyam mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brjod pa thams cad ni sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis brjod du med do/ /bsod

snyoms len pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /de nas bud med des 'phags pa rab 'byor la bzod pa gsol nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor bshos gsol nas bcom ldan 'das

ga la ba der bzhud cig dang / bdag kyang chos mnyan pa'i slad du der mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bsod snyoms de blangs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas byung nas de chos thos pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas zas la

sems mi 'jug par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis bsod snyoms blangs na gang la log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba su zhig la sbyin par bya snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mi len pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems sems kyis shes

nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor bsod snyoms 'di bdag la byin cig dang / bdag la byin na log par ltung bar

mi 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ci khyod tshul khrims blangs pa'am/ tshul khrims la gnas pa yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blang du med pa ste/ de la ni tshul khrims kyang med/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyang med do/ /btsun pa

rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag ni srog gcod par byed pa dang / ma byin par len pa byed pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa byed pa dang / du smra ba byed pa dang / phra ma byed pa dang / tshig rtsub po smra ba dang / tshig kyal pa smra ba dang / brnab sems can dang / gnod

sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang / log par lta ba can yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i bstan pa 'di 'dra ba las na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin par the tsom med kyis ldem po ngag 'di bdag gis dri bar

bya'o snyam mo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ci las bsams te/ 'di skad du bdag ni srog gcod pa byed pa dang / ma byin par len pa byed pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa byed pa dang / du

smra ba byed pa dang / phra ma byed pa dang / tshig rtsub po smra ba dang / tshig kyal pa smra ba dang / brnab sems can dang / gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang / log par lta ba can yin no zhes smra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mi len pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la tshigs su

bcad de smras pa/ byang chub lam ni bla med pa'i/ /lam ni bdag gis rnam par sbyangs/ /srog chags bye ba phrag stong yang / /lam de la ni yongs su bkod/ /srog ni bdag gi shin tu gtugs/ /de phyir bdag ni de skad smra/ /gang dag lam ni rnam par sbyangs/ /de dag srog

gcod pa zhes bya/ /lhas ni byang chub byin ma yin/ /brgya byin tshangs pas ma byin te/ /ma byin par ni bdag gis blangs/ /de phyir bdag ni ma byin len/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /'thun pa'i theg pa blangs pas na/ /de phyir theg pa chen po 'di/ /ma byin blangs

zhes bya ba yin/ /'dod pas log par yongs shes pa/ /chos 'dod yin zhes de dag shes/ /'dod pa 'di dag 'dod ma yin/ /de phyir log ces spyod par byed/ /sgrar ni ji snyed gdags pa rnams/ /de dag zhes yang dag gsungs/ /med pa'i phyir na de te/ /

du smra ba zhes kyang bya/ /theg pa dman pa 'dod pa yi/ /sems can gang dag su yang rung / /sems can de dag dbye ba'i phyir/ /theg pa che la dgod par byed/ /phra ma'i tshig ni smra byed cing / /mu stegs can gzhan 'byed par byed/ /sems can lam ngan lhung ba rnams/ /

yang dag lam la 'dzud par byed/ /rgol ba de dag tshar bcad de/ /de dag shin tu dga' ba med/ /rtsub pa'i tshig ni smras nas kyang / /bdud rnams thams cad pham par byas/ /rtsub pa'i tshig ni smra mod kyi/ /'on kyang sems la khro ba med/ /sems can smin par bya ba

la/ /dpa' bo rnams kyis thabs la ltos/ /gang las dgongs te gsungs pa yi/ /dgongs pa'i tshig ni rab tu shes/ /des na bsams te rab smra zhing / /sems can bye ba 'dul bar byed/ /kha cig la ni bsams te smras/ /kha cig de dag par shes/ /

de phyir bsams te smra ba yin/ /chos kyi mngon sum rtogs par byed/ /sems can ji snyed yod pa rnams/ /re re la yang de dag ni/ /mi min lha yi bde ba dag /'jig rten na ni brnab sems byed/ /bde ba gang dag ldan gyur na/ /'jig rten mgon po phan

byed 'gyur/ /bde ba de ni sems can kun/ /ldan par mkhas rnams brnab sems byed/ /sems can thams cad rgyal gyur ces/ /rtag tu de dag brnab sems byed/ /brnab sems de 'dra yin pas na/ /de phyir brnab sems can zhes smras/ /dam pa'i chos ni

'jig pa'i tshe/ /stobs chen rnams kyis tshar bcad de/ /de dag rang gi bde ba spong / /chos dang srog chags spong mi byed/ /'jig rten kun gyi rgol ba dang / sems can kun dang mi 'thun te/ /thams cad 'thun par bya ba'i phyir/ /de dag gnod sems ston par byed/ /

de dag bskal par rtsod byed dam/ /bskal pa bye bar rtsod kyang rung / /dam pa'i chos ni spong mi byed/ /slar yang ldog par yongs mi byed/ /log par lta la dpa' ba rnams/ /de dag 'dus byas kun la snyoms/ /log par lta ba rab tu shes/ /yang dag lta ba'i rnam par

rtog /gang dag de 'dra'i chos dang ldan/ /de dang de dag khrims la gnas/ /gnas med la ni gnas bcas nas/ /mkhas rnams byang chub rtogs par 'gyur/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis rigs kyi bu de la bsod snyoms de byin nas 'di skad du skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu

dag gis ni dad pas byin pa'i bsod snyoms log par ltung bar mi byed do zhes smras so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor zan ma zos te phyem red kyi dus na nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos

phyag 'tshal te/ ji ltar gyur pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de su yin pa shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bud med 'gyur ba zhes bya ste dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/ /rab 'byor dper na yungs 'brus shing rta bkang ba la yul ma ga d+hA'i khal bcu tshad nyi shu

yod pa las lo brgya zhing yungs 'bru re re bor ba ni bgrang ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis shing rta de'i yungs 'bru'i mtha' ches myur du rtogs par nus kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur bas dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can bla na med pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed pa dang / sems can mang po lha dang mir skye ba la bkod pa rnams ni de lta ma yin no/ /de nas bud med de bud med lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du bdar te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri

ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med de 'ong ba thag ring po nas gzigs te/ gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bud med lnga brgya tsam 'ong ba 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom

ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur bas dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su smin par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa sha stag go/ /

de nas bud med de bud med lnga brgyas bskor cing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de bsu nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan

pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'phags pa'i chos ma thob pa dang / 'phags pa'i lus su mi gnas pa'i bud med la ci'i phyir phyag 'tshal/ bud med des smras pa/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu gal te 'jig rten na 'phags pa ni gang

dag lags/ 'phags pa ma lags pa ni gang dag lags pa mkhyen na khyod kyis spobs pa mdzod cig /gnas brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa/ che zhe khyod kyis 'jig rten na 'phags pa gang dag yin pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa gang dag yin pa shes sam/

smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag gis 'tshal to/ /smras pa de dag gang yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'phags pa'i rigs mi gcod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa gang dag lags pa

de dag ni 'phags pa'o/ /'phags pa rnams la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams la thar ba 'dod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang bud med rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ gos gtsang ma srab mo

gyon pa/ phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa rnams la sten pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba ni ches sla'i dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dben pa na gnas pa ni de lta ma lags so/ /

btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang don 'di nyid brda sprad pa'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bgyi na btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ mching bu'i nor bu bai dUr+ya'i snod du bcug pa 'dam mam/ 'on te nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa 'dam rdzab tu bcug pa 'dam/ gnas brtan shA ri'i

bus smras pa/ che zhe nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa 'dam rdzab tu bcug pa 'dam gyi mching bu'i nor bu bai dUr+ya'i snod du bcug pa ni de lta ma yin no/ /smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba ni

ches 'phags kyi/ dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dben pa na gnas pa de ni de lta ma lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ che zhe khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu theg pa chen po ni

gang la yang mi gnas la ldog pa yang ma mchis so/ /smras pa/ che zhe gal te khyod theg pa chen po gang la yang mi gnas la ldog pa yang med na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci la zhugs/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu theg pa chen po pa rnams ni

ci la yang mi gnas te/ ma rig pa zad par bgyi ba'i slad du de dag mi gnas pa nas rga shi'i bar du zad par bgyi ba'i slad du de dag mi gnas so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar du mi zad pa'i slad du'o/ /des na de dag ni skye ba'i chos can

yang ma lags/ 'gag pa'i chos can ma lags so/ /gal te skye bar gyur na ni de las zad par 'gyur na gang gi phyir mi skye ba de'i phyir mi zad do/ /de bas na zad pa yang ma mchis/ skye ba yang ma mchis so/ /dge sbyong gi chos ni mi skye ba'i chos can no/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu de

ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /che zhe khyod ni lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pas phyag bya ba'i 'os yin na tshe dang

ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang zag gis gang zag la tshod 'dzin pa su zhig mchis te/ che zhe 'di ni 'di ltar rgyan gyis legs par brgyan la 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum

tshogs pa dang ldan pa lags so/ /bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni rgyan gyi spobs pa ma lags so/ /smras pa/ 'o na gang gi spobs pa yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan lags te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di

lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang / snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i rgyan dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems kyi rgyan dang / thos pa'i chos yongs su 'tshol ba la chog mi shes pa'i rgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams dang

ji ltar kun chub par byas pa rnams la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog cing dpyod pa'i rgyan dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / chos zab mo rnam par nges pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / sems can gyi dbang po

mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan dang / rgyan de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan te/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu brgyad po de dag ni rgyan dag lags te/ rgyan de dag gis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa

dang ldan no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das che zhe 'di gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes lags/ de nas bud med des bdag nyid kyi lus ci 'dra ba de kho na 'dra ba'i bud med dag gcig tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du

sprul to/ /sprul nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis bud med 'di la ga las shi 'phos te 'dir skyes zhes dris shig /gnas brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bud med 'di ni sprul pa yin te/ sprul pa la ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med do/ /

smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa gang yin pa de dag la ni 'chi 'pho'am skye ba 'dri bar mi bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba zhes bya ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba nas shi 'phos nas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir

'dir 'ongs so/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba 'dis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur bas

bud med kyi gzugs nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan pa'i bar dang / bdag gi bud med kyi lus ma mchis par gyur te/ skyes pa'i lus su ma gyur gyi bar

du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs las mi ldang lags so/ /bud med lnga brgya po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bud med kyi rang bzhin las gyur te/ skyes pa'i rang bzhin du ma gyur gyi bar dang / bla na med

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan gyi bar du bdag cag mi ldang lags so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de nas de'i mod la bcom ldan 'das

kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa 'od kyis khyab par byas nas tshangs

pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du thug ste/ phyir log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun

dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba bud med lnga brgyas bskor ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtugs pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'

bud med 'gyur ba 'di bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po'i spobs

pa can zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ des byang chub thob pa na bud med lnga brgya po 'di dag gzungs thob pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba 'dis yon tan gyi rgyan bstan pa gang dag yin pa'i rgyan brgyad po de dag

gis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa can des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan

gyi rgyal po spobs pa can de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'byor cing rgyas la/ bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / mi dang / skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur te/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i longs spyod dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med ni ming tsam yang med par

'gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad pad ma'i snying po las rdzus te skyes nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang / rgyan brgyad po de dag gis brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba de dang / bud med lnga brgya po

de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba de kho nas ta la bdun srid tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ de'i mod kho na la khye'u lo bcu drug lon pa tsam du snang bar gyur to/ /de dag bar snang de las babs te

bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas de dag thams cad kyi spyi bor phyag gis byugs so/ /de nas de dag thams cad kyis de'i tshe gzungs dang kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan

pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung la gzhan dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par ston cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis spobs pa bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya bar zung shig /bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med

'gyur ba 'khor dang bcas pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

bstod do// //'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// sh+lau ka drug
brgya/ bam po gnyis pa'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsan drot+ta rA dA ri kA byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa

zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ dgra bcom pa lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong

gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems can thams cad

kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod

pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ tshig thogs pa med pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa/ shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i sems dang bral ba/ zang zing med par chos ston pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/

bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa spangs pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin la the tsom med pa/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med par smon lam shin tu brtsams pa bzhin 'dzum pa/ khro gnyer med pa tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smra ba la mkhas pa/

sems yongs su ma gtugs pa/ spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid la bzod pa thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa/ tshig gcig gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gcig tu ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ 'das

pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dben pa dang / g.yo ba med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ nam

mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bur mos pa/ shes rab dang ye shes tshad med pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ sems thogs pa med pa chos la sred pa dang bral ba/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa

med pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i yon tan bkod pa yongs su zin pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par rgyun du mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs

pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ kun nas ldang ba dang / lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / bag la nyal sna tshogs spong ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / 'byung dka' dang / spos kyi glang po dang / brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /

spos kyi 'od zer rab tu gtong ba dang / 'brug sgra dang / gser 'od rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / lag na rin po che dang / lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / snang ba'i rgyal po dang / mthong dga' dang / sems can sgrol dang / rtag

tu brtson dang / rtag tu rgod dga' dbang po dang / ngan song spong dang / rdo rje'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / mthong ba don yod dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / pad ma'i dpal dang /

bal glang spos kyi glang po che dang / spobs pa zab mo dang / spobs pa chen po dang / chos 'phags dang / chos kyi rang bzhin the tsom med pa dang / seng ge'i stabs su 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pa kun sel dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / seng ge chen po mngon par

sgrogs pa'i sgra dang / brjod med dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang yang thabs cig go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang / sna chen po la

gtogs pa rnams dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs kyi mi rnams dang / zhabs 'bring gnyug ma rnams dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pa byas te/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na tshal chen po'i

khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na lits+tsha bI dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ longs spyod mang ba/ mdzod dang bang ba mang ba zhig gnas te/ de la chung ma dri med ma

zhes bya ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ zla ba dgu 'das pa dang / de las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad legs par rdzogs pa zhig btsas so/ /

bu mo de btsas ma thag tu khyim de thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ phyi rol gyi sgo gang gi wa dag las kyang mar khu dang / 'bru mar dag rab tu 'dzag cing zhan pa dang / mgon med pa dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa gang yin

pa dag ci bder yongs su spyod do/ /yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na/ rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang ma brdungs par sgra 'byin par gyur cing me tog gi char chen po dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur/ khyim

gyi grwa bzhir yang rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'i gter chen po bzhi byung zhing kha bye ste kun tu snang bar gyur to/ /bu mo de btsas ma thag tu ngu skad mi 'byin cing mchi ma mi blog la lhag par yang sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /sdig

las byas pas 'dir ni gtsang ma yi/ /lus su mi skye yid du 'ong bar min/ /sdig las byas pas 'dir ni longs spyod dag /'byor pa'i khyim rnams su yang mi skye'o/ /sbyin dul yang dag sdom dang bag yod cing / /gus dang bcas pas bla ma bsnyen bkur ba'i/ /gya nom rang

bzhin las kyi rtag tu ni/ /longs spyod bdag nyid chen po'i khyim du 'grub/ /'dren pa rgyal ba 'od srung bsod snyoms phyir/ /yangs pa can gyi grong du zhugs pa na/ /bdag gis khang steng nas mthong gyur cing / /mthong nas der ni bdag yid dang ba dran/ /de tshe

bdag yid rab tu dang gyur nas/ /bdag la me tog med cing byug pa med/ /phye ma spos med zas dang skom med pas/ /ston pa 'di la cis mchod bya snyam sems/ /de nas bdag gis sgra thos sangs rgyas ni/ /'gro ba dgrol phyir zang zing med spyod cing / /'jig rten brtse

phyir thugs rje skyes nas ni/ /sangs rgyas bsod snyoms slad du 'jig rten brgyan/ /gal te rgyal ba de dag mchod 'dod na/ /sangs rgyas nyid phyir khyod kyis smon lam thob/ /byang chub sems bskyed brtan gyur gang yin pa/ /de las lhag mchod srid pa gsum na med/ /

bar snang sgra thos de nas bdag gis ni/ /mtshan mchog spras pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /byang chub phyir ni mi g.yo yid skyes nas/ /khang pa de nas rang gis lus mchongs te/ /bar snang ta la srid la 'dug nas ni/ /phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / /

de bzhin rgyal ba 'od srung de yi sku/ /rin chen ri dang lhun po 'dra ba mthong / /rgyal ba'i mthus ni bdag gi lag mthil du/ /man dA ra ba'i phur ma che byung zhing / /de dag bdag gis 'od srung gtor ba dang / /me tog gdugs gyur nam mkha' la ni gnas/ /gang dag

phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa/ /mtshan gyis sku brgyan de dag bltas na yang / /ji ltar 'od srung steng na 'dug pa ltar/ /de dag la yang me tog gdugs nyid snang / /mkha' la gnas bzhin bdag gis tshig smras pa/ /bskal pa chu rdul snyed du spyad bya zhing / /

byang chub ma thob bdag phyir mi ldog gis/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtsor gyur cig /bdag gis seng ge'i nga ro de thos nas/ /de tshe stong phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba yi/ /lha mi lha min gnod sbyin srin po rnams/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mchog la yang dag zhugs/ /

thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum lhar skyes shing / /las bzang byas pa chud zar ma gyur pas/ /de nas shi 'phos 'dzam gling 'dir 'ongs kyis/ /de phyir skye bo rnams kyis bsod nams byos/ /gang tshe sum cu rtsa gsum gnas gyur pa/ /de tshe bdag gis rgyal ba shAka thub

mchod/ /bdag ni 'dod dang longs spyod lus mi gnyer/ /rgyal ba yang dang yang du mchod par bya/ /bdag gis bsod nams rnam smin de mthong zhing / /nyin gcig 'dra ba tshe rabs brgya yang dran/ /bdag 'dir skyes pa'i dpal yang 'di 'dra na/ /mkhas

pa su zhig rgyal la gus mi skyed/ /de nas bu mo des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas cang mi zer bar 'dug par gyur to/ /de'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu'i rgyu 'thun pas lus la lha'i gos rin po che dag gyon bzhin du byung bar gyur nas de'i lus las zla ba las shin tu khyad

par du 'phags pa'i 'od zer gser gyi mdog tu snang ba dag kyang byung ngo / /de nas pha ma dag gis de'i ming zla mchog ces bya bar btags so/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog de skad cig dang / thang cig dang / yud tsam cig gis 'di lta ste/ dper na bu mo lo brgyad lon pa lta bu'i na

tshod du kun tu snang ngo / /des sa'i phyogs gang dang gang dag tu 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / mal bcas par gyur pa de dang de dag tu 'od zer gser gyi mdog lta bu dag snang bar gyur to/ /de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas tsan dan sa mchog pa'i dri dag dang / kha nas kyang

ud pa la sngon po'i dri ngad byung bar gyur to/ /de nas yangs pa can gyi grong khyer gyi tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / de las gzhan pa rigs che ba rnams dang / rigs mtho ba dag gis bu mo zla mchog gi lus kyi gzugs dang / kha dog yongs su

rdzogs pa thos so/ /thos nas kyang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis sems shin tu dkris par gyur cing so so nas 'di snyam du sems te/ de bdag gi chung mar gyur na ci ma rung snyam mo/ /de nas skye bo phal po che rnams de thob par bya ba'i phyir sems brtson par gyur te/ de dag las

kha cig ni lits+tsha bI dri ma med par grags pa la sten par byed/ sten par byed cing bsnyen bkur byed par gyur to/ /kha cig ni nor bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bai dUr+ya dang / spug dang / an da rnyil dang / dung dang / men shel dang / byi ru bye ba snyed dag sbyin zhing

'dod pa skyed par byed do/ /kha cig ni nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / longs spyod dang / kha zas dag stobs par byed do/ /kha cig ni bran dang / bran mo dang / las mi dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dag la gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa la sogs pa dag gis 'jigs pa

ston par byed do/ /kha cig ni lits+tsha bI dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces zer te/ gal te khyod kho bo cag la bu mo zla mchog 'bul bar mi byed na/ de'i phyir khyed la des sdug bsngal 'byung bar bya zhing khyod la gnod pa chen po yang bya'o zhes zer ro/ /de nas lits+tsha bI

dri ma med par grags pa 'di snyam du ma la dpung dag lhags nas bdag bzung zhing bcom ste/ bu mo yang phrogs la bdag kyang srog dang phral bar mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/ skrag cing dngangs la sgyid lug cing spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ de dran pa nyams shing gzhan gyi sro

shi la rab tu ngu zhing mchi ma blags te/ mig mi 'dzums par bu mo zla mchog la lta'o/ /bu mo zla mchog gis rang gi pha ngu zhing yi shi la gdong mchi mas yog cing yul yul por gyur pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab ci'i slad du 'di ltar

bshums shing bshums mo dag rab tu glog par mdzad lags/ de nas lits+tsha bI dri ma med par grags pas bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo 'di ltar khyod dbrog cing khyod kyi phyir grong khyer thams cad du thab mo dang rtsod pa dag kun tu 'byung bar khyod kyis mi shes sam/

de'i phyir dpung dag lhags shing bcom ste/ khyod phrogs par mi 'gyur grang snyam nas des na mchi ma byung ba yin mod/ de nas bu mo zla mchog gis rang gi pha la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te 'dzam gling sems can thams cad dag /sred med bu 'dra'i brtson 'grus thob gyur

cing / de dag mtshon thogs bdag slad rgyug gyur kyang / /de dag rnams kyis bdag gzhom rngo mi thogs/ /byams sems ldan la dug dang mtshon mi tshugs/ /ro langs dang ni 'jigs pa gzhan mi 'byung / /byams sems tha ba zhe sdang ma mchis pas/ /byams

pa'i sems la gzhan gyis gnod mi 'gyur/ /yab bdag 'jig rten dag la byams pa che/ /ngan bu bdag bzhin 'gro la dga' bar gnas/ /nam yang gzhan la sdug bsngal ma bgyis pas/ /de phyir ngan bu sdug bsngal mi 'gyur yab/ /chags bral nam

yang 'dod chags ma mchis shing / /byams pa yongs bsgoms zhe sdang ma mchis lags/ /bdag la chags sdang gti mug ma mchis te/ /de phyir ngan bu gzhan gyis mi thub yab/ /yab dang yum la byams pa mchis pa ltar/ /'gro ba kun la rgyun du bdag de bzhin/ /

yab gang 'jig rten dag la de 'drar byams/ /de ni nams kyang gzhan gyis gnod mi 'gyur/ /nam mkha' dog sa 'dzin par bgyid gyur ram/ /lhun po yungs 'bru'i nang du gnas gyur tam/ /rgya mtsho chen po gnag rjes zhugs gyur kyang / /bdag 'joms

bgyid par rngo thogs ma mchis yab/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas rang gi pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /yab yum de'i slad du 'di ltar deng nas dgung bdun na bu mo zla mchog phyir 'byung bar 'gyur zhing byung nas kyang rang gang 'dod pa'i

khyim thab 'dam par 'gyur gyis/ der khyod cag gis bsgrim par bya zhing lam srang dang bzhi mdo dang sum mdo'i phyogs thams cad kyang rgyan dag gis brgyan par bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa'i cho ga dag gis kyang byi dor

gyis shig ces shul po che dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo thams cad du dril dkrol zhing sgra bsgrag tu gsol/ de nas bu mo zla mchog gis pha ma gnyis rang gi khyim nas byung ste/ 'di skad du deng nas zhag bdun na bu mo zla mchog phyir 'byung bar 'gyur zhing byung nas kyang bu mo

gang 'dod pa'i khyim thab 'dam par 'gyur gyis/ der khyed cag gis bsgrim par bya zhing lam srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo'i phyogs thams cad rgyan dag gis brgyan par bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa'i cho ga

dag gis kyang byi dor gyis shig ces rang bzhin de dag kun tu bsgrags so/ /de skad so sor thos nas/ yangs pa can gyi skye bo phal po che rnams 'di ltar rang rang gi lam srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo'i phyogs dag brgyan par bya ba la brtson par gyur cing / sems

la 'di snyam du ci nas kyang bu mo zla mchog ni bdag la 'dzin gyi gzhan dag la ni ma yin grang snyam du sems te/ de dag phan tshun 'gran pas rang rang brgyan par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / zhang blon dang / bram ze dang / rgyal bu rnams dang

las mi'i bar dag kyang shin tu khrus byas shing lus legs par byugs te/ gos bzang po bgos shing rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan nas rang rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams la khyed cag sgrims shig /gal te bu mo zla mchog 'u bu cag gi gan du rang mi 'ong ba lta na/ de'i

phyir mthus drangs la phrogs shig ces skul bar byed do/ /de ltar zhag bdun 'das pa dang / skye bo phal po che dag ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ bu mo zla mchog blta ba'i phyir 'dus par gyur to/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog nyi ma drug pa la zla ba nya ba'i tshe gso sbyong yan

lag brgyad po yang dag par blangs te mtshan mo mi nyal tsam na/ steng gi khang thog na 'chag cing 'dug go/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bu mo zla mchog gi lag pa g.yas par pad ma sdong bu ni gser/ 'dab ma ni dngul/ ze ba ni bai dUr+ya/ snying po ni rdo'i snying po

las byas pa/ 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma yod pa/ blta na sdug pa 'od gsal ba zhig byung bar gyur to/ /pad ma de'i snying po'i dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sku mdog gser 'dra la gzi brjid 'bar ba/ 'od kyis snang bar mdzad pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis

kyis sku legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus gzugs mdzes par byas pa/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa zhig kyang byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'i 'od kyis khyim de thams cad snang bas gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog gis

pad ma de mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mthong ba dang / dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'di 'dra'i dpal dang ldan pa khyod/ /

ci lags lha 'am 'on te klu/ /lha min gsang ba mi'am ci/ /su lags dris pa nges par gsungs/ /khyod sku gser mdog 'od gsal ba'i/ /tshad ni dmigs su ma mchis te/ /skad cig mdog gser btsod ka dang / /myur bar shel 'od 'dra bar gda'/ /

ngan bu lhan chad lus kyis ni/ /'du shes ma mchis sems mi g.yo/ /mgon po khyod kyi sku mthong nas/ /bdag ni dga' ba yangs pa skyes/ /khyod sku dpal 'bar me 'dra zhing / /ri las ri bzhin mdzes 'phags pa/ /ji ltar bzung zhing rab tu gnas/ /gang

nas 'dir byon gang du gshegs/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku des bu mo zla mchog la phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga ni lha min klu yang min/ /mi'am ci min gnod sbyin min/ /sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge yis/ /nga ni khyod kyi gan du btang / /nga ni

lha min gnod sbyin min/ /klu min mi'am ci yang min/ /chos byung nga deng khyod kyi phyir/ /lha mi 'dul bas bka' stsal to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la bu mo zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba/ /de mdog

ci 'dra 'dir gsungs la/ /de yi rtags dang dbyibs gsungs dang / /de thos bdag gis rtogs par 'gyur/ /khyod 'dir sangs rgyas mtshan gsungs na/ /de mdog rtags dang dbyibs mi gsung / /sangs rgyas rung spyod gang dang 'thun/ /mi mnyam mdzad spobs

'dir gsungs shig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku des bu mo zla mchog la phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ de ni sku mdog gser 'dra zhing / /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga'/ /sems can kun gyi mchod rten de/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod

do/ /byed ldan sems can rnams kyi ni/ /spyod pa mchog dang dman pa dag /thugs gcig gis ni rtogs mdzad de/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /chos kun rnam pa thams cad du/ /des ni mi mkhyen cung zad med/ /ye shes kun gyi pha rol byon/ /de phyir

sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /des ni sems can kun gyi sems/ /thugs gcig gis ni rtogs gyur kyang / /kun gyi sems la nam du yang / /rlom pa mi mnga' gzhan du na/ /sangs rgyas spyod pa sbyin pas 'phags/ /tshul khrims spyod pas mthor 'phags

shing / /bzod dang brtson pas mngon 'phags la/ /bsam gtan shes rab yang dag 'phags/ /bzo rnams thams cad legs bslabs pas/ /des ni mi mkhyen cung zad med/ /byams dang thugs rje phun sum tshogs/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /

gang gis bla med 'khor lo yi/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor cing / /zhing rnams bye ba rnams rig la/ /bdag med rab tu bstan mdzad cing / /gang gis sangs rgyas zhing stong dang / /brgya dang khrag khrig snyed rnams dag /ljags kyis rab tu khyab mdzad pa/ /de phyir

sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /zhing rnams bye ba stong phrag ni/ /gang gA'i bye ma snyed dag tu/ /dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad pas na/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /'dren pas phyag ni ya gcig gis/ /zhing rnams bye snyed blangs mdzad cing / /bskal pa bye bar

de bzhugs pas/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /zhing rnams stong phrag bye snyed na/ /ri bo lhun po ji snyed pa/ /skra nyag gcig gis de sbams shing / /zhing rnams bye bar 'phen mdzad la/ /chos rnams kun la rang byung zhing / /gsan nas go 'phang mchog

brnyes la/ /sems can bcing ba rnam 'grel bas/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /dbang ldan gyur cing stobs bcu mnga'/ /mi bsnyengs rtogs par thugs su chud/ /sangs rgyas chos la nem nur med/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /dbu yi gtsug

tor bltar mi mthong / /spyan lnga dag dang ldan pa dang / /stobs dang dbang po lnga mnga' zhing / /byang chub yan lag lam la gnas/ /ngang tshul bzang zhing 'grogs na bde/ /zhi zhing dul la bla na med/ /g.yo med drang po gsal ba ste/ /de phyir

sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /de ni rtag tu mnyam gzhag cing / /de la g.yeng ba mi mnga' la/ /sems can don gyi dus su gsung / /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /yon tan kun dang legs ldan zhing / /de ni 'gro ba'i mchod rten te/ /thams cad

mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /nga yis bskal pa'am yang na ni/ /bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang / /gang phyir sangs rgyas de don brjod/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog dga' zhing mgu la

yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa blta bas yongs su skom par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la phyir tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang gi yon tan de 'dra ba'i/ /rdzogs sangs de ltar rngo

thogs sam/ /chos 'di thos na mkhas pa ni/ /su zhig skad 'ga'ang khyim la dga'/ /ji srid bde gshegs ma mthong bar/ /bdag ni rmugs dang gnyid spong zhing / /zas dang skom yang mi 'tshal la/ /stan la'ang mchis par mi bgyid do/ /bdag gis khyod

mthong shin tu rangs gyur cing / /yon tan bdag nyid thos nas bdag rab dang / /mngon sum sangs rgyas de ni mthong 'gyur la/ /slar zhing mtshungs med dga' bar 'gyur lags grang / /bskal pa stong phrag bye bar 'jig rten na/ /skyes bu mchog rnams

mthong ba shin tu dkon/ /dgra bcom de'i mtshan deng thos bdag gis ni/ /rnyed pa legs rnyed bdag gis rgyal ba blta/ /sprul pa de yis de la 'di skad smras/ /sems can mchog de tshal chen nang na bzhugs/ /de yi dge 'dun stong phrag brgyad po dag /dpa' bo

sdig med mi gtsang spangs pa yin/ /de dag re re'ang lag pa ya gcig gis/ /bskal pa mang por stong gsum zhing 'deg cing / /ting 'dzin mngon shes spobs pa rab thob la/ /thos pa mi 'khrug rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin/ /de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir rdzu 'phrul

gyis/ /bye ba dpag med zhing du skad 'gas 'dong / /dong nas sangs rgyas bye snyed mngon mchod cing / /brtan rnams phyir yang skad 'gas ldog par byed/ /bdag tu 'du shes sangs rgyas 'du shes med/ /zhing du 'du shes sems can 'du shes med/ /spros pa

sna tshogs kun gyis ma gos shing / /sems can tshogs chen rnams kyi don yang byed/ /dgra thul de dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /de bzhin dge slong dge 'dun lta 'dod cing / /thub dbang drung nas chos mchog nyan 'dod na/ /tshal chen gang na ston de

bzhugs par song / /de nas bu mo zla mchog pad ma de nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ji ltar bzhugs pa de nyid thogs bzhin du khang steng de nas babs nas rang gi pha ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rang gi pha ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yab

gzigs ngan bu'i sug pa g.yas pa na/ /pad ma gser sdong mdzes pa yid du mchi/ /skyes bu dam pa'i sku la gzigs shig yum/ /mthong na su zhig de la skyabs mi mchi/ /rang gi gnas kun gser mdog 'dra ba yi/ /'od kyis gsal ba bdag gis mthong lags

yum/ /skad cig la yang du mar mdog 'gyur bas/ /sku yi tshad ni gzung bar rngo mi thogs/ /de slad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar tshal chen du/ /rgyal ba gau tam gzigs su gshegs so yum/ /me tog rnams dang spos mchog bsnams nas su/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa la ni mchod par bgyi/ /zla ba mchog gi pha dang ma dag gis/ /yid du 'ong ba'i tshig thos legs so zhes/ /gos rnams dang ni bdug spos spos dag dang / /me tog rnams dang phreng ba byug pa'ang blangs/ /rnga chen rdza rnga hab shang gdugs rnams dang / /dung dang rgyal

mtshan gling bu pi bang dang / /rin chen sil snyan yid 'ong thogs nas ni/ /de dag khang pa de nas nges par byung / /de'i tshe na nyi ma bdun pa de la srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag bu mo zla mchog blta ba'i phyir 'dus par gyur nas/ de dag las kha cig ni

'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis sems kun nas dkris par gyur/ kha cig ni lta 'dod par gyur/ kha cig ni rtog pa skyes par gyur nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po rgyan gyis brgyan to/ /khye'u dang bu mo dag kyang stegs bu dang / sgo khang dang / rta

babs dang / skar khung dang / pu shu dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang steng dag tu dong ste 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad ma la bzhugs pa de nyid kyang thogs bzhin du pha ma dang 'khor mang po rnams dang lhan cig tu

me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag thogs te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa sna tshogs byed pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar

te rang gi gnas nas byung ngo / /de nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis de grong bar gyi dbus su byung ba mthong ba dang / bdag gis 'di gzung bar bya'o snyam du sems shing rab tu rgyug go/ /de'i tshe na yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na skye bo phal po che de dag lhan cig tu rgyug pa'i tshe ha

ha tshur shog tshur shog ces bya ba'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog gis de'i mod la skye bo phal po che rgyug pa de dag mthong nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad ma la bzhugs pa de nyid kyang thogs bzhin du bar snang gi nam mkha' la shing ta la'i

srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur to/ /'dug nas kyang skye bo phal po che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bzod ldan bdag gi mdzes pa'i lus 'di ni/ /chags pa'i sems las byung ba ma yin te/ /kha dog gser mdog me lce 'bar ba

'dra/ /shin tu yid 'ong kho mo'i lus 'di ltos/ /gang dag yul rnams la ni brkam med na/ /me mdag 'obs 'dra rab 'bar 'dod spong zhing / /dbang po drug rnams sdom pas bsdams pa dang / /gang dag tshangs spyod rnams spyod dag pa dang / /gang dag

gzhan gyi bud med rnams mthong na/ /ma sring snyam du 'du shes skyed byed na/ /de dag mdzes shing shin tu blta sdug la/ /rtag tu mchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /gang gis sa 'di kun tu khyab byed pa/ /bdag gi spu yi khung nas byung ba'i dri/ /'dod chags

sems kyis bdag gis de ma bsgrubs/ /de ni sbyin dang dul ba'i 'bras bu yin/ /kho mo 'dod chags ldan pa'i sems mi skyed/ /'dod chags bral la chags pa ma skyed cig /ji ltar smras bden nam yang min te/ /mdun gyi thub dbang 'di ni bdag gi dpang / /sngan

chad khyod cag kho mo'i phar gyur la/ /kho mo'ang khyed kyi pha dang phu nu dang / /sring mo'am mar yang yang dang yang gyur pas/ /su zhig ma la 'dod chags sems skyed byed/ /sngan chad kho mos khyed kun bsad gyur cing / /khyod kyis kho mo'ang sngan chad bsad gyur pas/ /thams

cad phan tshun dgra bo gshed yin na/ /khyed cag ji ltar 'dod chags sems skyed byed/ /chags pas gzugs dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing / /chags sems can dag bde 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ /chags pa'i sems ldan mya ngan mi 'da' bas/ /de phyir 'dod

chags yongs su spang bar bya/ /'dod pa'i gzhi las dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur zhing / /'dod chags las ni dud 'gror 'gyur/ /gang dag 'dod chags dkris pa'i sems ldan pa/ /grul bum lha min gnod sbyin sha zar 'gyur/ /'dod chags las

ni zhar ba 'theng po dang / /lce med gzugs mi sdug pa dag tu 'gyur/ /gang dag 'dod chags ngan pa'i spyad spyod pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs skyon gyi snod du 'gyur/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob pa dang / /sum cu gsum pa'i dbang phyug brgya byin dang / /tshangs pa

dbang ldan dbang sgyur gang yin pa/ /de ni tshangs spyod yangs pa spyod pa yin/ /rtag tu 'dod pa dag la brkam pa rnams/ /dmus long 'on pa glen pa khyi phag dang / /rnga mo bong bu spre'u dang glang po dang / /stag dang gnag rta phye leb sprang bur 'gyur/ /

gang dag tshangs spyod yangs pa spyod byed pa/ /sa yi dbang phyug dga' ba rnams dang ni/ /tshong dpon khyim bdag blon por gyur nas ni/ /bde zhing yid bde zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /rang rgyal rnams dang de bzhin dgra bcom dang / /sangs rgyas mtshan gyis spras pa

gsal gyur cing / /bla med byang chub zhi ba rtogs gyur nas/ /sems can tshogs chen rnams kyi don mdzad 'gyur/ /'dod pas 'khor ba dag na bsreg pa dang / /yang na du bas bdug cing gsad pa'am/ /bcing dang de bzhin brdeg bsdigs mgo dang ni/ /rna mig sna dang rkang

pa gcad par 'gyur/ /'dod spyod nyes pa gcig tu ma zad de/ /'dod rnams mi 'thun nyes pa mtha' yang med/ /gal te myur du de nas thar 'dod na/ /tshur sheg rgyal ba de yi spyan sngar 'deng / /lha mis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par/ /rten dang dpung

gnyen gzhan dag yod min zhing / /rgyal ba 'byung ba bskal pa brgyar dkon gyis/ /thams cad lhan cig 'grogs te 'dong bar bya/ /bu mo zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / nam

mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang a la la zhes ca co dang ga zha'i sgra chen po 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu phyung ste/ me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu phab/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang rab tu gsil to/ /skye bo phal po che de dag

kyang shin tu yid byung zhing spu zing zhes byed la ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas 'ga' yang phyin chad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / khro ba dang / 'thab pa dang / 'chab pa dang / gnod sems dang / rnam par gnod pa med cing thams cad kyang sems

kyi sgrib pa dang bral la lus rab tu sim zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur nas/ bu mo zla mchog de la ma dang sring mo dang / ston pa lta bur sdug par gyur cing phyag byas te/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang /

byug pa de dag gis kyang mngon par gtor to/ /gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus de nas de'i mod la me tog de dag me tog gi gdugs dpag tshad phyed tsam pa zhig tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng na 'dug par gyur to/ /

de nas bu mo zla mchog bar snang de las babs te/ sor bzhi tsam gyis sa la ma reg par nam mkha' la 'chag bzhin du yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ngo / /de'i rkang pa bzhag pa dang bteg pa thams cad du sa chen po rab tu g.yos pa dang / yangs pa

can gyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong tham pa yang bu mo zla mchog song ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te lhung bzed

thogs nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por zhugs pa dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis bu mo zla mchog skye bo phal po ches yongs su bskor cing rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa

'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bu mo zla mchog 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro na/ bdag cag gis 'di ci bzod pa thob pa zhig gam/ 'on te ma yin zhes shes par byas/ dri ba 'ga' zhig yongs su dri bar bya

'am zhes nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dge slong de dag dang lhan cig tu bu mo zla mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod gar 'gro/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad du bu mo khyod gar

'gro zhes gsung ba ni gnas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchi lags so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni yangs pa can du 'jug la khyod ni yangs pa can nas byung na/ 'o na khyod 'di skad du gnas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid

du bdag kyang mchi lags so zhes zer ba de ji ltar rigs par 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod zhabs gang nas 'deg cing gang du 'jog par mdzad lags/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni rkang pa nam mkha' las

'deg cing nam mkha' nyid la 'jog par byed do/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag kyang sug pa nam mkha' las 'deg cing nam mkha' nyid la 'jog par bgyid de/ nam mkha'i khams la ni tha dad pa cung zad kyang ma mchis pas/ btsun pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du bdag gis 'di skad ces khyod gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchi lags so zhes smras so/ /btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod gar gshegs/ sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro'o/ /bu mos

smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba lags pas bdag kyang der mchi ba lags so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo gal te chos thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba yin na/ 'o na khyod ci'i phyir

yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba la ni skye ba dang 'jig pa yang ma mchis la/ yongs su mya

ngan las 'das par mchi ba la ma gtogs par yang gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'ga' yang ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mchi ba nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de skad ces

smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo 'o na ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ 'on te theg pa chen po la yang dag

par zhugs pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad du khyod theg pa gang la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes gsung ba ni btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du de khyod nyid la zhus khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdab tu gsol/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i

bu khyod kyis rtogs pa'i chos gang lags pa'i chos de ci nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags/ sha ra

dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de la ni rnam par rtog pa'am/ spros pa 'ga' yang med la tha dad pa nyid kyang ma yin/ gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin/ sna tshogs nyid kyang ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / spros pa ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad dang / tha dad du dbyer ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni gang gnas par 'gyur ba'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dmigs

su ma mchis lags so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyi spobs pa ni ngo mtshar na gzhan yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces khyod kyis de bzhin

gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas zhes gsung ba ni de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings ji snyed pa la'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo de bzhin nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyang ji snyed cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa

dang srid pa'i sred pa ji snyed pa'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa yang ji snyed cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/

bu mo sems can gyi khams kyang ji snyed cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ji snyed pa'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis ci zhig

lan btab pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gnas brtan gyis gang yongs su dris pa de nyid kyi lan bdag gis btab lags so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bos ci zhig yongs su dris/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu yi ge gang dag yongs su dris pa de dag nyid nges par bstan lags so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo yi ge rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa ste/ gdags su med pa yin pas de dag ni nges par bstan par mi nus so/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la yang gang gis yongs su dris pa dang / gang gis lan btab pa de gnyi ga yang dmigs su ma mchis lags so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i

bus smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar khyod ni bzod pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa dag yod pa kho na yin pas khyod ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bu mos smras pa/ btsun

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang spros pa lags so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba de yang spros pa lags so/ /nye ba zhes bgyi ba'am ring ba zhes bgyi ba de yang spros pa lags so/ /btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad

ces khyod ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ba ni btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni skye ba ma mchis pa/ 'gag pa ma mchis pa/ chad pa ma

mchis pa/ rtag pa ma mchis pa/ don gcig pa ma lags pa/ don tha dad pa ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas de la ni gang mngon par rdzogs

par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba 'ga' yang dmigs su ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ma lags pa ste/ byang chub ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis dang bral ba lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i

bus bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song shig dang / kho bo cag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir der 'dong ngo / /de nas gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bu mo zla mchog gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i

bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyan 'tshal ba rnams la chos ston par mi mdzad lags so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa su dag la chos ston par mdzad/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag nyan par bgyid kyang dga'

bar mi bgyid de/ mngon par dga' ba mi bgyid pa rnams la'o/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sems can mang po dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dag la chos ston par mi mdzad dam/ bu mos

smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs par 'du shes shing chos la ngar 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni 'di snyam du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bdag cag la chos ston par mdzad pa'o/ /'di ni chos te bstan par bgyi ba'o snyam du

sems lags kyi chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa rnams ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ chos sam/ bstan pa zhes bgyi bar sems pa ma mchis lags sam/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras

so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta bu'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'gro bas na der ni chos bstan pa chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas bdag cag zan bcad de phyir log na ni 'o bu cag la legs kyis/ bdag cag chos

mnyan pa de lta bu las phyi rol du gyur na ni ma yin no/ /de nas nyan thos chen po de dag phyir phyogs te de nyid nas phyir log par gyur to/ /de nas bu mo zla mchog tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan

dang / ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ mngon par rab tu gtor to/ /skye bo phal po che de dag gis kyang ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par

gtor te/ gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la me tog de dag me tog gi gdugs rgyar dpag tshad bcu tsam pa zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng na 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bu mo zla mchog la 'di

skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir 'ongs/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgongs/ gang bdag gi sug pa g.yas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad ma la bzhugs pa 'di gang nas

shi 'phos te 'dir byon la/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur snyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni sprul pa ste sprul pa la ni 'chi 'pho yang med la skye ba yang med do/ /bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis kyang de bzhin du sprul pa'i

rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad la gang 'chi 'pho ba'am skye ba de ma mthong lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo bud med kyi lus kyis ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na

khyod ci'i phyir bud med kyi lus sgyur bar mi byed/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid lags pas stong pa nyid la ni ldog pa dang 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin gyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad

ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dis gzigs pa ltar bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis smras

pa/ bu mo khyod kyis chos kyi gtam la spobs par gyis shig /bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings la ni brjod par bgyi ba dang rab tu brjod par bgyi ba ma mchis la/ chos kyi dbyings ni yi ger 'grang ba yang ma lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs

pa thogs pa med pas smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar chos ji lta bu thos/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i slad du steng du gzigs shig dang / bar snang ci 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa yang de 'dra la/ de bzhin gshegs

pa ci 'dra bar chos bstan pa nyid kyang de 'dra/ nyan pa nyid kyang de 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de lta bu lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag la

ji ltar sbyin pa byin zhing ji ltar yongs su bsngos/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa zhig phul bar gyur na de la rgyu ba ji lta

bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ smras pa/ bu mo sprul pa la ni rgyu ba 'ga' yang 'byung ba med do/ /bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis kyang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag la de ltar sbyin pa byin zhing yongs su bsngos pa lags so/ /byang chub sems

dpa' thogs med sems kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod sems can rnams la ji ltar byams pas khyab par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ji lta ba kho na bzhin du'o/ /smras pa/ bu mo sems can de dag kyang ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ rigs

kyi bu 'das pa yang ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba yang ma lags la/ sems de yang 'das pa yang ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba yang ma lags pas byams pa bsgom pa de ni 'di 'dra'o zhes gdags par rngo mi

thogs lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis chos kyi mig thob bam/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis sha'i mig kyang ma thob lags na chos kyi mig lta thob par ga la 'gyur/ byang chub sems

dpa' blo gros brtan pas smras pa/ bu mo khyod yun ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yun ji srid cig nas smig rgyu la chu yang dag par zhugs pa'i yun de srid nas bdag

kyang byang chub la yang dag par zhugs lags so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bu mo khyod yun ji srid cig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/

bu mos smras pa/ yun ji srid cig gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi sa las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur ba de srid kyis lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sring mo 'di gtso bo chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu dag dang lhan cig yang dag par smra yang 'jigs par mi bgyid/ dman par mi bgyid pa ni bu mo 'di'i spobs pa ngo mtshar lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la

bu mo zla mchog gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na zhugs ni ji tsam du chung yang sreg pa'i ngo bo nyid lags pas ji tsam du nye bar len pa rnyed pa de tsam du sreg par bgyid lags so/ /btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pas tha dad du dbye ba cung zad kyang ma mchis pas de dag thams cad bdag dang gzhan dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lags so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo

byang chub thob nas khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/ gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sems can dman pa la mos pa/ shes rab chung ba/

gzhan gyi don la mi lta ba/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag gi ming yang grag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu 'gyur lags so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo gang khyod 'di skad ces chos kyi dbyings ni gcig go/ /de bzhin nyid ni gcig go/ /

zhes zer na 'o na ci khyod kyis nyan thos rnams ni dman pa nyid yin la ci sangs rgyas rnams ni lhag pa yin par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na ba lang gi rjes kyi chab gang lags pa dang / rgya mtsho chen

po'i chab gang lags pa de dag la ni bye brag cung zad kyang ma mchis lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang ba lang gi rjes la ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag gi go skabs ma mchis lags so/ /btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa

rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings gcig las nges par byung ba lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag ltar sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /btsun pa sha ra

dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na yungs 'bru'i khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha'i khams gang lags pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha'i khams gang lags pa'i nam mkha'i khams de dag la ni bye brag cung zad

kyang ma mchis pa lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang yungs 'bru'i khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha'i khams la ni phyogs bcu'i khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha' ltar grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag rab tu mi gnas shing kun tu mi gnas

la ri'i rgyal po ri rab dag kyang ma mchis rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang ma mchis lags so/ /btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nyan thos rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa gcig las nges par

byung ba lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ltar sems can tshad med pa grangs ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rngo mi thogs lags so/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sangs

rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig pa ma yin nam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig go zhes gsung ba ni skur pa 'debs pa lags so/ /sha ra dwa

ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ci'i phyir/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du de khyod nyid la yongs su zhus/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdab tu gsol/ gang gi tshe btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems rnam par grol ba de'i tshe/ ji ga stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil ltar mnyam pa kun tu gnas par gyur lags sam/ ji ga shing ljon pa dang ri thams cad kyis khyod logs su mngon par phyogs te btud mngon par btud/ mngon par rab tu btud lags sam/ ji ga ngan song

thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur lags sam/ ji ga sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur lags sam/ ji ga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'og tu mnar ma mchis pa la thug pa yan chad dang / steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar

thug pa'i bar dag 'od zer gyi kha dog lta bus snang bar gyur lags sam/ ji ga lha thams cad kyis phyag bgyis lags sam/ ji ga bdud kyi sa dang nam mkha' dpag tshad sum cu tshun chad dpung gis khyab par bgyis te mchis par gyur lags sam/ ji ga sems kyi skad
